MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, after Masato joined, for a while the Little Busters was the three of you.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And then Kengo appeared and challenged you guys, am I right?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It was us that went to challenge his family's kendo school.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeehhh?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why? Was his family doing something bad back then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、なにも」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, nothing at all.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a minute. The Little Busters was formed to vanquish evil, wasn't it?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Not really.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えぇぇぇえぇぇーーーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeeeehhhhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeeehhhhh!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kyousuke is just an idiot who does whatever looks like fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kyousuke is just an idiot who does whatever looks like fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Aye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Aye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ある日、全日本選抜少年選抜なんたらっていう剣道の大会で優勝した同い年の小学生がこの町にいるって噂が飛び込んできたわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝One day, we heard of an elementary school boy of the same age living in this town, who'd won something like an all Japan invitational boys' invitational tournament.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝One day, we heard of an elementary school boy of the same age living in this town, who'd won something like an all Japan invitational boys' invitational tournament.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「選抜って二回いったぞ、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You just said invitational twice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You just said invitational twice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「新聞に載ったり、地元のテレビのニュースで取り上げられたりしてよ、いきなりこの町のヒーローみたいに成り上がりやがったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And he caught the attention of the newspapers and local TV news networks, and was made into some kind of hero of the town.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And he caught the attention of the newspapers and local TV news networks, and was made into some kind of hero of the town.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「恭介はどうだかしらねぇが、オレからすれば、そりゃ鼻持ちならねぇわけだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't know how Kyousuke felt about it, but it really ticked me off.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't know how Kyousuke felt about it, but it really ticked me off.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「戦うことに関しちゃ、譲れねぇからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You know how I can't stay calm when it comes to fighting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You know how I can't stay calm when it comes to fighting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それで謙吾の実家が道場だったから、道場破りを思いついたわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Since his family was running their own kendo school, we decided to do a dojo challenge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Since his family was running their own kendo school, we decided to do a dojo challenge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「たのもーってな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We were like ❛please forgive the intrusion.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We were like ❛please forgive the intrusion.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、結果は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So who won?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So who won?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「訊くな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「負けたんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You guys lost, didn't you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You guys lost, didn't you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「だってよぉ、剣道なんて初めてやったんだぜ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How could we win when we did kendo for the first time in our lives!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How could we win when we did kendo for the first time in our lives!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「道場破りがすごいいいわけするね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I never expected such a sensible excuse...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I never expected such a sensible excuse...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴も戦ったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did you fight too, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did you fight too, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん、反則で負けた。ルールがよくわからなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, and I was disqualified for a foul. I didn't really know the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, and I was disqualified for a foul. I didn't really know the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか想像がつく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's pretty easy to picture what happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's pretty easy to picture what happened.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介は？　恭介だったら、初めてでも、なんとかしてくれそうじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about Kyousuke? I think he'd be able to make it through even on his first time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about Kyousuke? I think he'd be able to make it through even on his first time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…負けたさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...He lost as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...He lost as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ、恭介でも負けるの!?　それは想像つかないなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eehh, even he lost!? I can't believe it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eehh, even he lost!? I can't believe it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「師範にな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝To the main instructor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝To the main instructor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「相手は謙吾じゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wasn't the opponent Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wasn't the opponent Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつは馬鹿だからな、一番強い奴と戦って負けた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Because he's such an idiot, he wanted to fight the strongest one in the school and lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Because he's such an idiot, he wanted to fight the strongest one in the school and lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介らしいというか…ほんと馬鹿だね…勝てるわけないじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's so stupid... It does sound like him, though... How could he possibly defeat the main instructor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's so stupid... It does sound like him, though... How could he possibly defeat the main instructor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So then what happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So then what happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、最終的には勝った。三人がかりでだけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, we won at the end. With the three of us ganged together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, we won at the end. With the three of us ganged together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、謙吾が仲間にくわわった、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And then Kengo joined, huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And then Kengo joined, huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど、じゃあ、謙吾を仲間にするには謙吾に勝てばいい、それだけだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. So, all we have to do to make him one of us is to get a victory over him, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. So, all we have to do to make him one of us is to get a victory over him, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「しかも、三人がかりでもいいんなら、なんとかなりそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Plus, if it's okay that the three of us team up, I think we can win easily enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Plus, if it's okay that the three of us team up, I think we can win easily enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、謙吾には誰も勝ってない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, it wasn't Kengo we took down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, it wasn't Kengo we took down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はい…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレたちが倒したのは、師範のほうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It was the main instructor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It was the main instructor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええぇぇえぇぇーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeeeeeehhhhhhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeeeeehhhhhhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと待ってよ、何が目的だったんだっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait a minute. What was the purpose of your visit again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a minute. What was the purpose of your visit again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「道場破り」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dojo challenge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dojo challenge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいやいや…違うってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no... that's not it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no... that's not it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最初の目的は、全国大会で優勝して有名になった謙吾の存在が鼻持ちならなくなったから、それを倒して、最強を知らしめるためでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The original purpose was to defeat Kengo and claim the title of the strongest in town because you didn't like that he won an all Japan kendo tournament and got famous, wasn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The original purpose was to defeat Kengo and claim the title of the strongest in town because you didn't like that he won an all Japan kendo tournament and got famous, wasn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「はて…どこかで聞いたような話だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmm... I think I heard someone talking about something like that before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmm... I think I heard someone talking about something like that before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さっき真人が自分で言ったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You just told me that yourself, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You just told me that yourself, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえばかだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Such a dork.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Such a dork.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「途中から目的が変わっちゃってるよ。気づいてなかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Didn't you realize back then that the goal of the challenge had changed entirely?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't you realize back then that the goal of the challenge had changed entirely?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「鼻持ちならないと感じていたのは真人ひとりだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Actually, Masato was the only one who was bothered in the first place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Actually, Masato was the only one who was bothered in the first place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そのオレが気づかなかったんだから、んなことどーでもよかったんだろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But I didn't realize it at all myself, so I guess the reason didn't really matter to me after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But I didn't realize it at all myself, so I guess the reason didn't really matter to me after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな自分の馬鹿っぷりをさわやかに語られても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why would you admit your own folly so cheerily...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why would you admit your own folly so cheerily...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんか困ったことでもあるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Does it cause a problem?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Does it cause a problem?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、謙吾を倒すだけで仲間になってくれるんだとばかり思ってたからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I was confident that we'd be able to get Kengo in simply by defeating him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I was confident that we'd be able to get Kengo in simply by defeating him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「当時はしはんだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It was the main instructor we defeated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It was the main instructor we defeated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「師範かぁ…剣道部の顧問でいいのかなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The main instructor... Could it be that we're supposed to fight the instructor of the school kendo club?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The main instructor... Could it be that we're supposed to fight the instructor of the school kendo club?❞

MESSAGE.JP: も他人を倒すには動機がいるんじゃないのか？
MESSAGE.EN: But don't you usually need a good cause for defeating somebody?
MESSAGE.Translation: But don't you usually need a good cause for defeating somebody?

MESSAGE.JP: れとも、真人の時のように都合よく暴れ出してくれるのかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe he'd been acting violently like Masato did that one time...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe he'd been acting violently like Masato did that one time...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾の師範って、その当時荒くれてたわけじゃないよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo's instructor, he wasn't out of control or anything back then, was he?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo's instructor, he wasn't out of control or anything back then, was he?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「静かなひとだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He was a very quiet type.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He was a very quiet type.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は真人のほうを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin turned to face Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin turned to face Masato.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うしてそんな人に恭介は立ち向かっていったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What did Kyousuke have to pit himself against such a harmless man for?
MESSAGE.Translation: What did Kyousuke have to pit himself against such a harmless man for?

MESSAGE.JP: 介に訊くか？
MESSAGE.EN: Should I ask Kyousuke in person?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I ask Kyousuke in person?

MESSAGE.JP: いたとしても、漫画の世界という殻に閉じこもってしまった今の恭介が答えてくれるとは思えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I did, I don't believe that he would leave his comic world for long enough to answer me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I did, I don't believe that he would leave his comic world for long enough to answer me.

MESSAGE.JP: もそも、その答えを自分で導き出すことが重要なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: To begin with, it only counts if I find out the right answer by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: To begin with, it only counts if I find out the right answer by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: っかりしなくちゃ。一度目を強くつむる。
MESSAGE.EN: Get a grip on yourself, I told myself with my eyes closed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Get a grip on yourself, I told myself with my eyes closed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾の実家にいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We are going to Kengo's home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We are going to Kengo's home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、謙吾の師範だった人に話を聞くのがいいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: The first solution I came up with was asking the main instructor himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: The first solution I came up with was asking the main instructor himself.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　オレたちも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Us too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Us too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「当然。僕たち仲間でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course. We are all a team, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course. We are all a team, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、こいつはちがう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, he's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, he's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は真人のほうを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was looking at Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was looking at Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ちがうよな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're not, are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're not, are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「仲間だよっ、そんなショックな同意本人に求めるなよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yes I am! Don't ask me to affirm something that shocking!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yes I am! Don't ask me to affirm something that shocking!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「鬼こわいからいやだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't want you because you're scary as hell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't want you because you're scary as hell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もう鬼こわくしねぇからよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I promise I'll never be scary as hell anymore, so please!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I promise I'll never be scary as hell anymore, so please!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだよ、鈴。真人は仲間になったんだから、僕らの味方だよ。もう鬼こわくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just let him in, Rin. Masato is now our teammate. He's not scary as hell anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just let him in, Rin. Masato is now our teammate. He's not scary as hell anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「すでにでかいのがこわい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝In the first place, I'm scared of how tall you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝In the first place, I'm scared of how tall you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「くそーっ、小さくできねぇんだよっ、そこは目をつむってくれよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit, I can't make myself any smaller! Won't you please let it slide!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit, I can't make myself any smaller! Won't you please let it slide!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうそう。無理言っちゃダメだよ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you shouldn't complain about something he can't do anything about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you shouldn't complain about something he can't do anything about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よし、じゃ、明日の放課後みんなでいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, then, we are going to his home after school tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, then, we are going to his home after school tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うまとめた。
MESSAGE.EN: I wrapped things up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wrapped things up.

MESSAGE.JP: 日も晴天。
MESSAGE.EN: It was another sunny day.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was another sunny day.

MESSAGE.JP: 課後になると三人集まって、バスを乗り継いで、謙吾の実家へ。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as school was over, the three of us got together, and after taking a few buses we arrived at Kengo's home.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as school was over, the three of us got together, and after taking a few buses we arrived at Kengo's home.

MESSAGE.JP: 壁がずっと続いた先に、大きな門が。
MESSAGE.EN: After walking along the long, white wall, a giant gate greeted us.
MESSAGE.Translation: After walking along the long, white wall, a giant gate greeted us.

MESSAGE.JP: るでお城のような門構えだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like it belonged to a Japanese castle.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like it belonged to a Japanese castle.

MESSAGE.JP: てかけられた看板には『宮澤剣道場』とある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a wooden board by the gate that read ❛Miyazawa Kendo School.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a wooden board by the gate that read ❛Miyazawa Kendo School.❜

MESSAGE.JP: の字は、本当は難しいほうの漢字で書くのか。初めて知った。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know the kanji for ❛zawa❜ was actually the more complex version rarely used.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know the kanji for ❛zawa❜ was actually the more complex version rarely used.

MESSAGE.JP: の門構えとは不釣り合いなほど真新しいインターホンを押す。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed on the buzzer, which seemed fairly modern compared to the gate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed on the buzzer, which seemed fairly modern compared to the gate.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『はい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Yes?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Yes?]

MESSAGE.JP: 性の声。
MESSAGE.EN: A woman's voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: A woman's voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、すみません、宮沢謙吾くんの同級生で、友達の者なんですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, hello, we are Kengo Miyazawa-kun's classmates and friends...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, hello, we are Kengo Miyazawa-kun's classmates and friends...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女性@『いつも謙吾がお世話になっております』
MESSAGE.EN: `Woman@[Thank you for always taking good care of him.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Woman@[Thank you for always taking good care of him.]

MESSAGE.JP: 親なのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: This sounded like his mother.
MESSAGE.Translation: This sounded like his mother.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その謙吾くんの、師範の方、ご在宅でしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, is his instructor home at the moment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, is his instructor home at the moment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『謙吾の父でしょうか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[Do you mean his father?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[Do you mean his father?]

MESSAGE.JP: 父？
MESSAGE.EN: ...His father?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...His father?

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の師範は、お父さんだったのか？
MESSAGE.EN: The instructor was his father?
MESSAGE.Translation: The instructor was his father?

MESSAGE.JP: は真人と鈴を振り返る。ふたりはぶんぶんと首を横に振り、知らないことをアピールしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Turning around, I saw both Rin and Masato shaking their heads to imply they had not known.
MESSAGE.Translation: Turning around, I saw both Rin and Masato shaking their heads to imply they had not known.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ、多分、その、お父様です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, probably, I think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, probably, I think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『しばらく帰りませんがどのようなご用件でしょう？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[He is not going to be back home for a while. May I ask what business you have with him?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[He is not going to be back home for a while. May I ask what business you have with him?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、その、用件は直接会って話したいんですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, um, we'd like to speak to him in person...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, um, we'd like to speak to him in person...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『そうですか、残念ながらしばらくは戻りません』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[I see. I'm afraid he's not going to get back very soon.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[I see. I'm afraid he's not going to get back very soon.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの…電話とか、連絡先とか…教えてもらうわけにはいかないでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... could we have... his phone number or something like that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... could we have... his phone number or something like that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『お恥ずかしい話ですが、家族の者でも捕まえるのが難儀なものでして』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[This is embarrassing to say, but it is very difficult even for us to contact him.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[This is embarrassing to say, but it is very difficult even for us to contact him.]

MESSAGE.JP: んだろう？　放浪癖でもあるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: How come? Does he have some kind of wandering habit?
MESSAGE.Translation: How come? Does he have some kind of wandering habit?

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『武道の啓蒙のため、旅に出ております』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[He's on a journey to enlighten people on martial arts.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[He's on a journey to enlighten people on martial arts.]

MESSAGE.JP: の疑問に答えるように、そう教えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: As if answering the question in my mind, she told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if answering the question in my mind, she told me.

MESSAGE.JP: の時代に連絡がつかないような旅。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone traveling without means to be contacted in this modern world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone traveling without means to be contacted in this modern world.

MESSAGE.JP: んか、馬を引き連れて旅する古風な絵が浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It made me imagine an Edo period painting of a traveling vagabond with his horse.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made me imagine an Edo period painting of a traveling vagabond with his horse.

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『携帯電話のようなものも持っておらず、連絡はたまの書簡でのみです』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[He doesn't own anything like a cellphone. He only writes us once in a while.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[He doesn't own anything like a cellphone. He only writes us once in a while.]

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『時間はかかると思いますが、今回の件、お伝えしておきましょうか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[I imagine it will take quite long, but do you want me to tell him about you?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[I imagine it will take quite long, but do you want me to tell him about you?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ、できましたら是非。どのぐらいかかりそうでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, if you don't mind. Do you have any idea how long it might take?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, if you don't mind. Do you have any idea how long it might take?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『来月中には、どのような形でか折り返しご連絡できると思います』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[I assume I will be able to inform you of his response in some way within the next month.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[I assume I will be able to inform you of his response in some way within the next month.]

MESSAGE.EN: Next month...
MESSAGE.Translation: Next month...

MESSAGE.JP: 月だってまだ一週間以上残ってるのに、最悪一ヶ月以上も待たなければならないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's still a week remaining in the month, but in the worst case we're going to have to wait more than a month...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's still a week remaining in the month, but in the worst case we're going to have to wait more than a month...

MESSAGE.JP: 方に暮れてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: That made me feel completely at a loss.
MESSAGE.Translation: That made me feel completely at a loss.

MESSAGE.JP: てよ…母親なら、当時のことを知っているかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait... if it's Kengo's mother, she could know something about back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait... if it's Kengo's mother, she could know something about back then.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、すみません、ぶしつけな質問で申し訳ないですが…棗恭介、という僕らと同じ学校の男の子をご存じでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, excuse me for asking... but do you know Kyousuke Natsume? He's also a student in our school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, excuse me for asking... but do you know Kyousuke Natsume? He's also a student in our school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「十年ぐらい前にこちらに道場破りとしてやってきた三人の子供のひとりなんですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And he's one of the three kids who challenged your husband's school roughly ten years ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And he's one of the three kids who challenged your husband's school roughly ten years ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『…すみません、存じ上げません』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[...I'm sorry, but I don't know.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[...I'm sorry, but I don't know.]

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『お恥ずかしい話ながら、自分はそういう話を聞かされませんので』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[I'm ashamed to admit it, but he doesn't talk to me about his school.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[I'm ashamed to admit it, but he doesn't talk to me about his school.]

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『あの、お茶をいれますので、上がっていかれませんか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[By the way, I'll make you some tea, so why don't you come inside?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[By the way, I'll make you some tea, so why don't you come inside?]

MESSAGE.JP: は迷った。
MESSAGE.EN: I hesitated.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hesitated.

MESSAGE.JP: の人とはまったく関係のないところで問題は起きている、そう思えたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't seem to have anything to do with the problem we were trying to solve.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't seem to have anything to do with the problem we were trying to solve.

MESSAGE.JP: れに、これ以上でしゃばることは、お母さんと謙吾との関係に水を差すことにも思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Also, if we got involved with her more than this, we might somehow spoil the relationship between her and her son.
MESSAGE.Translation: Also, if we got involved with her more than this, we might somehow spoil the relationship between her and her son.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いえ、僕らも寮に戻らないといけないので、すみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we have to get back to our dorm. But thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we have to get back to our dorm. But thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 局、そう断った。
MESSAGE.EN: Eventually I declined.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eventually I declined.

MESSAGE.JP: 母親@『そうですか、またいつでもいらしてくださいね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Mother@[All right then. Come back again any time.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mother@[All right then. Come back again any time.]

MESSAGE.JP: はずっと考えたことをふたりに告げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I told Rin and Masato what I'd been thinking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told Rin and Masato what I'd been thinking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人と鈴は、謙吾のお父さんと戦ってたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, Rin, you guys fought Kengo's father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, Rin, you guys fought Kengo's father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「マジかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「その父親に無茶苦茶してやったぞオレたち…今更『謙吾の友達です』なんて口が裂けても言えねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We did a lot of nasty things to him during the fight... I can't tell him 'I'm your son's friend' now, even if you rip it out of my mouth...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We did a lot of nasty things to him during the fight... I can't tell him 'I'm your son's friend' now, even if you rip it out of my mouth...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえは口が裂けるから言えるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's OK for your mouth to get ripped, so you can tell him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's OK for your mouth to get ripped, so you can tell him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふたりとも自覚なかったなんて僕が驚きだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm surprised that you guys never noticed it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm surprised that you guys never noticed it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あいつの父親なんて会ったことないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Actually, we've never met his father.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Actually, we've never met his father.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その後もなかったわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, not after the fight, anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, not after the fight, anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだか閉鎖的な家庭環境だ。
MESSAGE.EN: His family seemed very closed off.
MESSAGE.Translation: His family seemed very closed off.

MESSAGE.JP: ろいろと複雑な気持ちになってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: My feelings on the matter were getting more and more complicated.
MESSAGE.Translation: My feelings on the matter were getting more and more complicated.

MESSAGE.JP: も、目的はひとつ。謙吾を仲間に戻すこと。それだけは忘れてはいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, we just have one goal: bringing Kengo back to us. We must remember that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, we just have one goal: bringing Kengo back to us. We must remember that.

MESSAGE.JP: かし、謙吾の父親からの連絡をのんきに待っているだけでいいのか？
MESSAGE.EN: But, should we really do nothing but wait for his father's reply?
MESSAGE.Translation: But, should we really do nothing but wait for his father's reply?

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ月待っても、答えが得られる保証もないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We aren't guaranteed to get a response even after a month.
MESSAGE.Translation: We aren't guaranteed to get a response even after a month.

MESSAGE.JP: んだかこの状況は、すでに不正解を意味しているように思えてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Considering that, I'm starting to think that it's not the right answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Considering that, I'm starting to think that it's not the right answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 飯の時間だ。食べながら、次の手を考えよう。
MESSAGE.EN: It's time for dinner. Guess I'll figure out the next step while eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's time for dinner. Guess I'll figure out the next step while eating.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾と恭介はどこで食べてるんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder where Kengo and Kyousuke are eating.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder where Kengo and Kyousuke are eating.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらずの空席を見て、そんなことを思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked, looking at their empty seats.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked, looking at their empty seats.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「謙吾は剣道部と一緒に食ってるぜ。そもそも運動部の連中はこの時間には食わない。まだ練習中だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kengo eats with the other kendo club members. To begin with, they don't eat this early. They're still practicing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kengo eats with the other kendo club members. To begin with, they don't eat this early. They're still practicing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか…恭介は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... What about Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... What about Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あいつは部屋に引きこもっちまってる。先輩の話じゃ、パンだけ食って過ごしているらしいが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He won't leave his room. According to a third-year student, he just eats bread every day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He won't leave his room. According to a third-year student, he just eats bread every day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちゃんと食べてるのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Does he eat enough...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Does he eat enough...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No clue.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No clue.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「心配だ…後で様子を見に行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm worried... I think we should go see if he's okay later on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm worried... I think we should go see if he's okay later on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえ、えらっそうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You sound so bossy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You sound so bossy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、仕方ないじゃん、今は僕がリーダーやってるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's because I'm the leader right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's because I'm the leader right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そうだぞ、鈴。おまえだって、理樹がいたからこうやって元気にご飯食べられるようになったんだろうが、あんな暗い顔してた奴がよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's right, Rin. You must keep it in mind that it's all thanks to Riki that you can now eat without any worries. Don't you remember how gloomy you looked before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's right, Rin. You must keep it in mind that it's all thanks to Riki that you can now eat without any worries. Don't you remember how gloomy you looked before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい、銅像くっつけてた奴にいわれたくない。なんだあれは、ファッションか。おまえの中では銅像がきてんのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up! I don't wanna be told that by somebody who was stuck to a bronze statue. What the hell was that? A new fashion statement? You like wearing a bronze statue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up! I don't wanna be told that by somebody who was stuck to a bronze statue. What the hell was that? A new fashion statement? You like wearing a bronze statue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「誰の仕業だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I wonder whose fault that was...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I wonder whose fault that was...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まぁまぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There, there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There, there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 年生の部屋は来たこともない階にあるので、少し緊張する。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I'd never been to the third-years' floor, I was a bit nervous.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I'd never been to the third-years' floor, I was a bit nervous.

MESSAGE.JP: れ違う生徒は全員ここでは上級生なのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Every student I passed by here was older than me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every student I passed by here was older than me.

MESSAGE.JP: か来たことある？と訊いてみても、ふたりとも首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked Rin and Masato if they had ever been here; both of them shook their heads in denial.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked Rin and Masato if they had ever been here; both of them shook their heads in denial.

MESSAGE.JP: りゃそうだ、と思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: It was no wonder, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was no wonder, though.

MESSAGE.JP: つだって恭介が一方的に押しかけてきたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because Kyousuke would always come over to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because Kyousuke would always come over to us.

MESSAGE.JP: っておいても、やってくるのだあの人は。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if we left him alone, he would still come to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if we left him alone, he would still come to us.

MESSAGE.JP: 介の部屋の前までやってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: We reached the door of his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: We reached the door of his room.

MESSAGE.JP: の向こうに恭介がいる。
MESSAGE.EN: He would be there beyond this door.
MESSAGE.Translation: He would be there beyond this door.

MESSAGE.JP: つては恭介がリトルバスターズのリーダーで…
MESSAGE.EN: The former leader of the Little Busters...
MESSAGE.Translation: The former leader of the Little Busters...

MESSAGE.JP: は僕がその立場にいる。
MESSAGE.EN: But now I am in his position.
MESSAGE.Translation: But now I am in his position.

MESSAGE.JP: んな顔をして会えばいいんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I say to him...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I say to him...?

MESSAGE.JP: ンコン。
MESSAGE.EN: *Knock*knock*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Knock*knock*.

MESSAGE.JP: ？と隣を見ると、鈴がノックしていた！
MESSAGE.EN: Hm? Oh my god, Rin's already knocking on the door!
MESSAGE.Translation: Hm? Oh my god, Rin's already knocking on the door!

MESSAGE.JP: の準備もできていないのに！
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not ready yet!
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not ready yet!

MESSAGE.JP: 事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: No reply came.
MESSAGE.Translation: No reply came.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「入っていいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Can we go in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Can we go in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃまずいよ、恭介ひとりの部屋じゃないんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we can't. He has a roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we can't. He has a roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「誰かいるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is there somebody else in there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is there somebody else in there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひとり部屋じゃないんだから、いるでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This room is for two, so yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This room is for two, so yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「あ、きみたち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Hey, you guys there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Hey, you guys there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋のドアが開いて、見知らぬ先輩がこっちを覗いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The door of the next room opened, and an unfamiliar third-year was looking at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door of the next room opened, and an unfamiliar third-year was looking at us.

MESSAGE.JP: 先輩@「棗の奴を心配してきてくれたんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Senpai@❝You guys came to see Natsume, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Senpai@❝You guys came to see Natsume, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 先輩@「勝手に入っていいから、様子見てやってくんない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Senpai@❝You can go in, so will you see if he's all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Senpai@❝You can go in, so will you see if he's all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「勝手に入ったらルームメイトさんに悪いですよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But going in without his roommate's permission...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But going in without his roommate's permission...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 先輩@「いや、そのルームメイトは気が滅入ってこっちの部屋に逃げ込んできてるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Senpai@❝Actually, his roommate has lost his spirit and has taken refuge in my room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Senpai@❝Actually, his roommate has lost his spirit and has taken refuge in my room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分の部屋の中を親指でくいっと指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: He pointed inside his room with his thumb.
MESSAGE.Translation: He pointed inside his room with his thumb.

MESSAGE.JP: 先輩@「布団にくるまって、ずっと漫画読んでてさ…いつ寝て起きてるかもわからない状態らしくてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Senpai@❝He said Natsume is reading manga in bed all day long every day... Not even sure when he's awake and asleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Senpai@❝He said Natsume is reading manga in bed all day long every day... Not even sure when he's awake and asleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がずきりと痛む…。
MESSAGE.EN: It cut into my heart...
MESSAGE.Translation: It cut into my heart...

MESSAGE.JP: んなひどい状態なんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: I never thought he was in such a horrible state...
MESSAGE.Translation: I never thought he was in such a horrible state...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そいつはやべーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's so not good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's so not good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の快活だった恭介からは想像もできない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke always used to be so energetic. What on earth happened to him...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke always used to be so energetic. What on earth happened to him...?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が、ドアを開けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the door.

MESSAGE.JP: は真っ暗だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was dark inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was dark inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 前を呼ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I called his name.
MESSAGE.Translation: I called his name.

MESSAGE.JP: 事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: No answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: No answer.

MESSAGE.JP: ッドに近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked up to the bunks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked up to the bunks.

MESSAGE.JP: のベッドが恭介のものだろう。そこから床まで雪崩でも起こしたように漫画が散乱していた。
MESSAGE.EN: The lower one could be recognized as his due to the volume of comic books covering it, scattered even on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The lower one could be recognized as his due to the volume of comic books covering it, scattered even on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ひでぇな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This is terrible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This is terrible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ここまでこいつオタクだったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I didn't know he was this much of a geek...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I didn't know he was this much of a geek...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 団にくるまっているのか、顔は見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Since he appeared to be wrapped in his blanket, I couldn't see his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since he appeared to be wrapped in his blanket, I couldn't see his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 画を踏みながら近づいていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I approached him, stepping on some comic books.
MESSAGE.Translation: I approached him, stepping on some comic books.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「起きてる…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You awake...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You awake...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: り上がった布団にそっと手を載せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I softly put my hand on the raised blanket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I softly put my hand on the raised blanket.

MESSAGE.JP: のままぺたんとへこんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And it deflated.
MESSAGE.Translation: And it deflated.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「きえた！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He vanished!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He vanished!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、元々いなかったんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, he wasn't in there from the start...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, he wasn't in there from the start...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「抜け出してる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He's not in the room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He's not in the room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「便所か…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Bathroom...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Bathroom...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、きえたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, he vanished...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, he vanished...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そこまでなぜその説を押すのかよくわからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't understand why you're so adamant about that theory...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't understand why you're so adamant about that theory...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふぎゃー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fugyaaahhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fugyaaahhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鳴かない、鳴かない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No hissing, no hissing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No hissing, no hissing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は布団の中に手を差し入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my hand under the blanket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my hand under the blanket.

MESSAGE.JP: 冷たい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The bed was cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The bed was cold.

MESSAGE.JP: イレなんかじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't go to the bathroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't go to the bathroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 介は、ずっといないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He wasn't in this room to begin with.
MESSAGE.Translation: He wasn't in this room to begin with.

MESSAGE.JP: ルームメイトにも知らせずに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Without even letting his roommate know.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Without even letting his roommate know.

MESSAGE.JP: にも何も言わずに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Without telling anyone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Without telling anyone...

MESSAGE.JP: こで、何をやっているんだ、恭介…。
MESSAGE.EN: Where are you and what are you doing, Kyousuke...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where are you and what are you doing, Kyousuke...?

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「おそろいでどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝What are you guys doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝What are you guys doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: きのあまり、心臓が飛び出そうになった。
MESSAGE.EN: My surprise was so great it felt like my heart was going to leap out of my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: My surprise was so great it felt like my heart was going to leap out of my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: らの背中のほうから、恭介の声がしたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: We suddenly heard Kyousuke's voice right from behind us.
MESSAGE.Translation: We suddenly heard Kyousuke's voice right from behind us.

MESSAGE.JP: り向くと、部屋の隅に人影がうずくまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: We turned around and found a figure sitting in the corner of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: We turned around and found a figure sitting in the corner of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: の部分を持ち上げて、こちらを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: With his face lifted, he was staring at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: With his face lifted, he was staring at us.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、いたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What, so you are here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What, so you are here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たしていたのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Is he really?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is he really?

MESSAGE.JP: っと、そこに…居たのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was he really there... all along?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was he really there... all along?

MESSAGE.JP: 配を感じなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't feel the slightest trace of anyone's presence in this room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't feel the slightest trace of anyone's presence in this room.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「明かりつけるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll switch on the light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll switch on the light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「やめてくれ、これから眠るんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't. I'm going to sleep now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't. I'm going to sleep now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「心配して来てやったのに、顔も見せねぇってかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We came to see you because we're worried about you, but you aren't even gonna let us see your face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We came to see you because we're worried about you, but you aren't even gonna let us see your face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺なら元気だ…問題ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm fine... No problems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm fine... No problems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どんなツラ下げて言ってんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So why not just let us see your face...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So why not just let us see your face...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「大丈夫だ…寝させてくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm just fine... Let me sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm just fine... Let me sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: がのそりと立ち上がった。
MESSAGE.EN: The figure slowly stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The figure slowly stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: らは無意識にベッドまでの道を作っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The three of us found ourselves unconsciously stepping aside as he walked to the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three of us found ourselves unconsciously stepping aside as he walked to the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: いてくるその顔を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw his face for a moment as he passed me by.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw his face for a moment as he passed me by.

MESSAGE.JP: の気が引いているような…白い顔だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was really white... like all his blood had been drained.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was really white... like all his blood had been drained.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「幽霊みたいだぞ、おまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You look like a ghost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You look like a ghost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介、休んだほうがいいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, you better get some rest...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, you better get some rest...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だからそうさせてもらうって言ってるだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I told you, I'm going to sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I told you, I'm going to sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っともだ。おかしなことを言ってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: He's absolutely right. I was being weird...
MESSAGE.Translation: He's absolutely right. I was being weird...

MESSAGE.JP: 介は布団に潜り込むと、壁を向いて胎児のように体を丸めた。
MESSAGE.EN: He crawled into bed, faced the wall and curled himself up like a sleeping baby.
MESSAGE.Translation: He crawled into bed, faced the wall and curled himself up like a sleeping baby.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もしかして…昨日までの真人と同じ状態なんじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe... he's going through whatever it was that Masato experienced until yesterday...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe... he's going through whatever it was that Masato experienced until yesterday...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はそんな疑念を抱いた。
MESSAGE.EN: That doubt rose in me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That doubt rose in me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は真人を見上げた。僕の言わんとするところをすぐ読みとったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My eyes were enough to convey my meaning to Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: My eyes were enough to convey my meaning to Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「恭介、オレは誰だ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kyousuke, who am I?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kyousuke, who am I?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「真人だろ…何をいってやがるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You are Masato... What joke is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You are Masato... What joke is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…眠らせてくれ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Let me sleep, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Let me sleep, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が首を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato shook his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato shook his head.

MESSAGE.JP: 人がどのような状況にかつてあったかは僕は知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what kind of situation Masato had been in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what kind of situation Masato had been in.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、同じではないと真人は教えてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet he told me it was not the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet he told me it was not the same.

MESSAGE.JP: も、何かが起きている。恭介の身にも。
MESSAGE.EN: But what was certain was that something was going on with him as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: But what was certain was that something was going on with him as well.

MESSAGE.JP: こに何か意図があるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: What lay behind this?
MESSAGE.Translation: What lay behind this?

MESSAGE.JP: かの意志なのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Or who?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or who?

MESSAGE.JP: 気の時だって遊ぶことを忘れないような恭介をこんな状態に陥らせるなんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: Whatever or whoever it was, I couldn't believe that they had turned Kyousuke, who played even when he was sick, into this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Whatever or whoever it was, I couldn't believe that they had turned Kyousuke, who played even when he was sick, into this...

MESSAGE.JP: れは神の意志でもなければありえないような出来事に思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so unthinkable that I could only picture the machinations of God behind it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so unthinkable that I could only picture the machinations of God behind it.

MESSAGE.JP: れほど無敵だったんだ、恭介は。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke has always been so invincible.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke has always been so invincible.

MESSAGE.JP: の代わりが今の僕…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I'm the substitute leader...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I'm the substitute leader...

MESSAGE.JP: は一体何を成し遂げようとしているんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world am I trying to accomplish?
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world am I trying to accomplish?

MESSAGE.JP: 体何を成し遂げさせられようとしているんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world am I meant to accomplish?
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world am I meant to accomplish?

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく呆然と立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I just stood there for a while, petrified.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just stood there for a while, petrified.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、おまえもおかしくなったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, have you gone nuts as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, have you gone nuts as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の声が耳元に聞こえて我に返る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's voice brought me back to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's voice brought me back to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、大丈夫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか、びっくりした。よかった。びっくりした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝OK, you surprised me. Glad you haven't. You surprised me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝OK, you surprised me. Glad you haven't. You surprised me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえも二回言ってるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You just said the same thing twice, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You just said the same thing twice, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にかく今は休ませよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyhow, we might as well let him sleep now...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyhow, we might as well let him sleep now...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's get out of here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's get out of here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らはそっと部屋を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: We silently left his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: We silently left his room.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんか異常だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Things are really out of whack right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Things are really out of whack right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: と気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: It dawned on me suddenly.
MESSAGE.Translation: It dawned on me suddenly.

MESSAGE.JP: 介は、かつての僕なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The present Kyousuke was the same as the past me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The present Kyousuke was the same as the past me.

MESSAGE.JP: の時の僕も、体を丸くして小さくなってふさぎこんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I met him, I spent all my days sitting curled up with my head in my knees.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I met him, I spent all my days sitting curled up with my head in my knees.

MESSAGE.JP: から、僕は恭介を救えるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, I can help him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, I can help him.

MESSAGE.JP: わなきゃいけないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to save him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to save him.

MESSAGE.JP: も、まだその時じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: But now is not the time to do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But now is not the time to do it.

MESSAGE.JP: 番が違う。
MESSAGE.EN: It's not his turn yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's not his turn yet.

MESSAGE.JP: は恭介の歩んだ道をトレースしてるんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: I am tracing the path Kyousuke walked back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: I am tracing the path Kyousuke walked back then.

MESSAGE.JP: ずは、謙吾を仲間にすることが先だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus I need to get Kengo on the team first.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus I need to get Kengo on the team first.

MESSAGE.JP: れが正解のはずなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That should be the right course of action.
MESSAGE.Translation: That should be the right course of action.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり謙吾の父親からの連絡をのんきに待ってる場合じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: As I thought, I shouldn't waste my time waiting for Kengo's father's reply to come.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I thought, I shouldn't waste my time waiting for Kengo's father's reply to come.

MESSAGE.JP: 介を救うためにも、一刻も早く謙吾を仲間にするんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In order to help Kyousuke out, I have to make Kengo one of us as soon as possible.
MESSAGE.Translation: In order to help Kyousuke out, I have to make Kengo one of us as soon as possible.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾の元へ急ごう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's hurry up and go to Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's hurry up and go to Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? What for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? What for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕の予想だけど…謙吾の身にも何かが起きてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is just a guess... but something must be going on with Kengo also.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is just a guess... but something must be going on with Kengo also.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れを解決すれば、謙吾も仲間になってくれるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He should join us if we can solve his problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: He should join us if we can solve his problem.

MESSAGE.JP: は先頭を切って、走り始める。
MESSAGE.EN: I sprinted into a run, Rin and Masato following after me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sprinted into a run, Rin and Masato following after me.

MESSAGE.JP: して、恭介を救い、もう一度５人が揃った時…
MESSAGE.EN: Once I rescue Kyousuke and the five of us are back together again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Once I rescue Kyousuke and the five of us are back together again...

MESSAGE.JP: 体何が始まるのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What will begin?
MESSAGE.Translation: What will begin?

MESSAGE.JP: るいは、終わるのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Or what will end?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or what will end?

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の顔色を三人でじろじろと確認した。
MESSAGE.EN: The three of us were closely inspecting Kengo's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The three of us were closely inspecting Kengo's face.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…いたって健康そうなんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...He looks like he's in pretty good shape.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...He looks like he's in pretty good shape.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「血色もいいし、病人の顔ではないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝His complexion seems fine. He doesn't look sick, at least...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝His complexion seems fine. He doesn't look sick, at least...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だが、顔はばかそうだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But his face looks stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But his face looks stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「喝ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kaaaaaaaaaaatsu!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kaaaaaaaaaaatsu!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うぉぉっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwoh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwoh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の一喝により僕らは気でも受けたように吹き飛ばされる。
MESSAGE.EN: His bellow blew us away as though struck by his fighting spirit.
MESSAGE.Translation: His bellow blew us away as though struck by his fighting spirit.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なにすんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「耳きーーーーんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My ears are riiiiiinging.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My ears are riiiiiinging.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それはこっちのセリフだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's what I want to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's what I want to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「耳きーーーーんがか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Your ears are riiiiiinging too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Your ears are riiiiiinging too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それではない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Guess again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Guess again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんだ、やぶからぼうに人の顔をじろじろと見て、果ては馬鹿そうなツラだと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's with you guys? You suddenly start staring at my face and then say it looks stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's with you guys? You suddenly start staring at my face and then say it looks stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、謙吾が元気か心配してきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We just wanted to make sure you were fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We just wanted to make sure you were fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「元気なものか、怪我をしてるんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Does it look like I'm fine, with this injury?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Does it look like I'm fine, with this injury?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブスの巻かれた片腕を指さして見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: He pointed at his plastered arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: He pointed at his plastered arm.

MESSAGE.JP: うか。
MESSAGE.EN: I get it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I get it.

MESSAGE.JP: れが、謙吾の抱えてる問題か。
MESSAGE.EN: This must be Kengo's problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: This must be Kengo's problem.

MESSAGE.JP: らこの骨折を治せば…
MESSAGE.EN: Then if I mend his broken bone...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then if I mend his broken bone...

MESSAGE.JP: て、そんな方法あるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, is that even possible?
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, is that even possible?

MESSAGE.JP: っつけーと念力を送るとか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should try channeling my spiritual healing power into my palms and...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should try channeling my spiritual healing power into my palms and...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうしたんだ、両手かざして？　気功か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you doing with your hands? Practicing qigong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you doing with your hands? Practicing qigong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 馬鹿か、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: ...OK, that was idiotic.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...OK, that was idiotic.

MESSAGE.JP: も、骨折を今すぐ治すなんて不可能だ。自然治癒を待つしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: That aside, it's impossible to cure a broken bone in an eye blink; you just have to let it heal on its own.
MESSAGE.Translation: That aside, it's impossible to cure a broken bone in an eye blink; you just have to let it heal on its own.

MESSAGE.JP: や、待てない…その間も、恭介は苦しみ続けるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No, we don't have time to wait... Kyousuke is suffering even as we speak.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, we don't have time to wait... Kyousuke is suffering even as we speak.

MESSAGE.JP: うしたらいいんだ？　わからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do? I just don't know...
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do? I just don't know...

MESSAGE.JP: 則のような気がするけど、目の前に謙吾がいるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This could be playing dirty, but Kengo himself is right here in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: This could be playing dirty, but Kengo himself is right here in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: こう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Guess I'll ask him...
MESSAGE.Translation: Guess I'll ask him...

MESSAGE.JP: 抱いてる一番の疑問を。
MESSAGE.EN: ...what the problem that is bothering him right now is.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...what the problem that is bothering him right now is.

MESSAGE.JP: は踵を返し、戻ろうとする。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around and started to walk away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around and started to walk away.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「えっ、もういいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Eh, you already done?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Eh, you already done?❞

MESSAGE.JP: てて鈴が追ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin ran up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin ran up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹はあいつの怪我を治すんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Weren't you going to heal his arm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Weren't you going to heal his arm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなこと無理だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だったら、何も問題は解決していないんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, nothing will change, will it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, nothing will change, will it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れはそうだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's right, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's right, but...

MESSAGE.JP: は足を止め、もう一度、謙吾のほうを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped walking and turned to face Kengo yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped walking and turned to face Kengo yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: のまま戻ったら、ここまでやってきた意味がない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I go back now, what we've achieved so far will all be for naught.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I go back now, what we've achieved so far will all be for naught.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり訊いてみよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I should ask him, after all,
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I should ask him, after all,

MESSAGE.JP: 抱いてる一番の疑問を。
MESSAGE.EN: ...what the problem that is bothering him right now is.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...what the problem that is bothering him right now is.

MESSAGE.JP: は再びその前に立ちふさがる。
MESSAGE.EN: I faced him once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I faced him once again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me ask you something, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me ask you something, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介はどうして謙吾のお父さんを倒したの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did Kyousuke fight your father for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did Kyousuke fight your father for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は片方の眉をつり上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: He lifted one eyebrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lifted one eyebrow.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「えらく昔の話を持ち出すな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's quite an old story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's quite an old story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「事情があってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I need to know this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I need to know this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾を仲間にするためにね…。
MESSAGE.EN: To make you our teammate...
MESSAGE.Translation: To make you our teammate...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…さあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...I wonder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...I wonder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺にあいつの考えてることがわかるはずないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How should I know what went through his head back then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How should I know what went through his head back then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れはまるで友達ですらないような言い方だった。
MESSAGE.EN: He sounded unconcerned, as though he wasn't even a friend of Kyousuke's.
MESSAGE.Translation: He sounded unconcerned, as though he wasn't even a friend of Kyousuke's.

MESSAGE.JP: だだ。ここで引き下がってはいけない。畳みかけろ。
MESSAGE.EN: No, it's not over yet. I can't give in here. I have to keep asking.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it's not over yet. I can't give in here. I have to keep asking.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、その結果、謙吾は恭介たちと遊ぶようになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, you started hanging out with Kyousuke as a result of him defeating your father, correct?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, you started hanging out with Kyousuke as a result of him defeating your father, correct?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは認めるか？
MESSAGE.EN: Will he confirm this much?
MESSAGE.Translation: Will he confirm this much?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どう、そこへ繋がるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How are those two supposed to be related?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How are those two supposed to be related?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐらかされてるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Is he dodging the question?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is he dodging the question?

MESSAGE.JP: 対繋がってるはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no way they're not connected.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no way they're not connected.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、恭介は何のために戦ったのさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, what did Kyousuke fight for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, what did Kyousuke fight for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の質問に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I returned to my previous question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I returned to my previous question.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾はしばらく黙って考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: He pondered wordlessly for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: He pondered wordlessly for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「十分楽しそうじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You seem to be having enough fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You seem to be having enough fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: して導き出された答えがそれだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And that was his answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that was his answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 意味がわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It didn't make sense.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It didn't make sense.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんな目的は捨てろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Just give up a goal like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Just give up a goal like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「これ以上先を目指すな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Stop trying to go beyond this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Stop trying to go beyond this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺はそんな目的のために、おまえの仲間にはなれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Unless you do that, I can't be with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Unless you do that, I can't be with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな目的？　この先を目指すな？
MESSAGE.EN: A goal like that? Don't go beyond this?
MESSAGE.Translation: A goal like that? Don't go beyond this?

MESSAGE.JP: まえの仲間にはなれない？
MESSAGE.EN: Or he can't be with us?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or he can't be with us?

MESSAGE.JP: はすぐ混乱に陥る。
MESSAGE.EN: Those words of his immediately addled me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those words of his immediately addled me.

MESSAGE.JP: 静になれ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I told myself to stay calm...
MESSAGE.Translation: I told myself to stay calm...

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は、僕のやろうとしていることを見透かしている。
MESSAGE.EN: He knows what I'm trying to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: He knows what I'm trying to do.

MESSAGE.JP: の僕でさえ、その先に何が待つのかわかっていないというのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: But even I don't know what awaits us upon reaching that goal...
MESSAGE.Translation: But even I don't know what awaits us upon reaching that goal...

MESSAGE.JP: は何をしようとしてる？
MESSAGE.EN: What is it that I'm trying to do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is it that I'm trying to do?

MESSAGE.JP: 吾はそれを知っているの？
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo, do you know the answer?
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo, do you know the answer?

MESSAGE.JP: っちが訊きたいぐらいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what I really want to know, for goodness's sake.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what I really want to know, for goodness's sake.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、鈴や真人の手前、そんな質問を投げかけるわけにはいかない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I can't ask him a question like that in front of Rin and Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I can't ask him a question like that in front of Rin and Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: たりは、僕を信じてついてきてくれているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Those two follow my lead, trusting in me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those two follow my lead, trusting in me.

MESSAGE.JP: れを不安にさせるような言動は慎まなければならない。
MESSAGE.EN: So I can't do anything that may worry them.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I can't do anything that may worry them.

MESSAGE.JP: 然たれ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to man up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to man up.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「宮沢せんぱーい、いかないんすかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Miyazawa-senpai, aren't you coming?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Miyazawa-senpai, aren't you coming?❞

MESSAGE.JP: じ袴姿の、剣道部の後輩だろう、奧の角から顔を覗かせ謙吾のことを呼んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: A boy in a kendo uniform, apparently a first-year, called out to Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: A boy in a kendo uniform, apparently a first-year, called out to Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もういいな。いくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That should be enough. I have to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That should be enough. I have to go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…ご飯まだだったんだね。引き留めて悪かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... You haven't had dinner yet. I'm sorry for keeping you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... You haven't had dinner yet. I'm sorry for keeping you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う謙吾は何も言わない。
MESSAGE.EN: He made no reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: He made no reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 中を向け、廊下を歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He simply turned around and walked off.
MESSAGE.Translation: He simply turned around and walked off.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「で、結局何がどうなったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, what's up with him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, what's up with him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は答える。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered his question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered his question.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何もどうなっていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't learn anything solid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't learn anything solid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、手かがりは得られた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I did get some clues.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I did get some clues.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えろ、考えろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Think, think hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Think, think hard.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の時と同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the same with Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the same with Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は、重要なヒントを僕に与えてしまったはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Willingly or not, Kengo should have given me some significant hints.
MESSAGE.Translation: Willingly or not, Kengo should have given me some significant hints.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけ意味不明の言葉を並べ立てたのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Many of the things he said made little sense.
MESSAGE.Translation: Many of the things he said made little sense.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「十分楽しそうじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You seem to be having enough fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You seem to be having enough fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんな目的は捨てろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Just give up a goal like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Just give up a goal like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「これ以上先を目指すな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Stop trying to go beyond this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Stop trying to go beyond this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は僕がしようとしていることを見透かしていたから、そんなふうに諭しにかかった。
MESSAGE.EN: He tried to persuade me that way because he saw through what I was trying to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: He tried to persuade me that way because he saw through what I was trying to do.

MESSAGE.JP: の謙吾は僕の最近の行動が恭介とかぶっていると見て、離れていった。
MESSAGE.EN: To begin with, the reason he left was because he found out I was doing the same thing that Kyousuke used to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: To begin with, the reason he left was because he found out I was doing the same thing that Kyousuke used to do.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり僕が恭介の代わりに何かを成そうとしているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It proved that I was, after all, about to achieve something which Kyousuke had done.
MESSAGE.Translation: It proved that I was, after all, about to achieve something which Kyousuke had done.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺はそんな目的のために、おまえの仲間にはなれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Unless you do that, I can't be with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Unless you do that, I can't be with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は、その恭介の『成そうとしていたこと』に反対していたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And Kengo was against ❛what Kyousuke was trying to make happen.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: And Kengo was against ❛what Kyousuke was trying to make happen.❜

MESSAGE.JP: から、それを引き継いだ僕から離れていった。
MESSAGE.EN: So, he left because I had succeeded Kyousuke's role.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, he left because I had succeeded Kyousuke's role.

MESSAGE.JP: も、そうすると真人のケースとはちょっと異なることになる。
MESSAGE.EN: But if that's true, this is clearly different from Masato's case.
MESSAGE.Translation: But if that's true, this is clearly different from Masato's case.

MESSAGE.JP: 人をもう一度仲間にできたのは、十年前の、恭介と真人との出会いを再現できたからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The reason why I succeeded in getting Masato to rejoin was my successful re-enactment of how he and Kyousuke had met ten years ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: The reason why I succeeded in getting Masato to rejoin was my successful re-enactment of how he and Kyousuke had met ten years ago.

MESSAGE.JP: 人自身が、当時の自分に戻るように仕組まれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato himself had been returned to his childhood days.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato himself had been returned to his childhood days.

MESSAGE.JP: の世界の『神』とも呼べる意志により。
MESSAGE.EN: By the will of someone that could be called the ❛god❜ of this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the will of someone that could be called the ❛god❜ of this world.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、謙吾は明確にその『意志』の存在を知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Kengo seemed to know of the existence of that ❛will.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Kengo seemed to know of the existence of that ❛will.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れに立ち向かっている。頑なにその意志を拒んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: He was standing up to it, thoroughly rejecting it.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was standing up to it, thoroughly rejecting it.

MESSAGE.JP: ぜなら、真人にも恭介にも降りかかった『何か』が、謙吾には降りかかっていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I've come to this conclusion because he's not experiencing that ❛something❜ which afflicted Masato and Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've come to this conclusion because he's not experiencing that ❛something❜ which afflicted Masato and Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: でに恭介が苦しんでいるのに、謙吾は何も変わらず普段通りでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: While Kyousuke is already suffering, Kengo seems just the way he usually is.
MESSAGE.Translation: While Kyousuke is already suffering, Kengo seems just the way he usually is.

MESSAGE.JP: れは謙吾をあの当時には戻せない、ということだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, he will not change back to the way he was back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, he will not change back to the way he was back then.

MESSAGE.JP: は、過去へと遡って、恭介の代わりとなり再び歩き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I have traveled back in time and started walking the steps of the leader of the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: I have traveled back in time and started walking the steps of the leader of the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: も、謙吾は今も、この時を生きる謙吾のままなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Kengo is still living in the present.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Kengo is still living in the present.

MESSAGE.JP: うすればいい…。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do...?

MESSAGE.JP: えれば考えるほど、わからなくなっていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: The more I try to figure out, the more confused I become...
MESSAGE.Translation: The more I try to figure out, the more confused I become...

MESSAGE.JP: っと単純に一緒に遊ぼうとか誘ったらよかったのかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should have simply told him that I wanted him to play with us...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should have simply told him that I wanted him to play with us...

MESSAGE.JP: の…自分でもよくわからない目的を悟らせないように…。
MESSAGE.EN: That way I could have avoided letting him realize my purpose, not that I know much about it myself either...
MESSAGE.Translation: That way I could have avoided letting him realize my purpose, not that I know much about it myself either...

MESSAGE.JP: しかしたらもう…
MESSAGE.EN: It's probably already too late...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's probably already too late...

MESSAGE.JP: 択を間違えてしまったのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I may have made the wrong choice...
MESSAGE.Translation: I may have made the wrong choice...

MESSAGE.JP: ん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang*!

MESSAGE.JP: の前で突然何かが弾けた。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden, there was a sharp noise right in front of my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden, there was a sharp noise right in front of my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: は尻餅をつき、瞬きを繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I fell on my bottom and blinked stupidly for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fell on my bottom and blinked stupidly for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「気づいたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Do you hear now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Do you hear now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が目の前に立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was standing before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was standing before me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今、何したの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you just do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you just do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「手、たたいただけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I only clapped my hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I only clapped my hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「何いっても聞こえてないみたいだったからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You didn't hear anything I said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You didn't hear anything I said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と真人も一緒にいるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I forgot that Rin and Masato are with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I forgot that Rin and Masato are with me.

MESSAGE.JP: たりは僕についてきてくれているんだから、そっちも気にかけなくちゃいけない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Since they are following me, I mustn't ignore them...
MESSAGE.Translation: Since they are following me, I mustn't ignore them...

MESSAGE.JP: 変だな、リーダーって。
MESSAGE.EN: Being a leader is pretty tough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being a leader is pretty tough.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何かして遊ぼうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Should we play something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Should we play something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そんなことしてる場合なのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you sure we have time for that now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you sure we have time for that now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね…そんなことしてる場合じゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right... We don't have time for it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right... We don't have time for it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あのな、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Look, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Look, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…わかるか、言いたいことが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Do you know what I'm trying to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Do you know what I'm trying to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今のじゃ超能力でもないとわからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not a psychic...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not a psychic...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「つまりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…ふにゃーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Funyaaaaahhhhh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Funyaaaaahhhhh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なに、悪いことした!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, what, did I do something wrong!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, what, did I do something wrong!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「鈍感な奴だな、てめぇは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're so thick-skulled.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're so thick-skulled.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、真人、わかるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, Masato, you know what she means?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, Masato, you know what she means?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「つまり…発情期だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's that, you know... she's in heat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's that, you know... she's in heat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ちがうわ、ぼけーーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No I'm not, you jerk!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No I'm not, you jerk!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: すっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: すっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うっ、うっ、二度と言いませんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uu, uu, I promise I won't say that ever again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uu, uu, I promise I won't say that ever again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: かしい雰囲気。見ていて微笑ましい（蹴られてる真人は大変だろうが）。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing Rin pummel Masato with her kicks brought back memories that made me smile (even though I did feel sorry for Masato).
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing Rin pummel Masato with her kicks brought back memories that made me smile (even though I did feel sorry for Masato).

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、結局なんなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what is it you wanted to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what is it you wanted to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「少し長くなるが、いいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This'll be a little long, is that okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This'll be a little long, is that okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…あたしたちは、仲間だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...We are always by your side.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...We are always by your side.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうした？　もうなんもないぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What is it? I'm done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What is it? I'm done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「短かっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That was short!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That was short!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 間、か…。
MESSAGE.EN: They are always by my side...
MESSAGE.Translation: They are always by my side...

MESSAGE.JP: うは、ひとりで悩むな、ということなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have wanted to say that I don't have to suffer my vexation alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have wanted to say that I don't have to suffer my vexation alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがとう、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレもいるぜ、忘れんなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm here too, don't forget.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm here too, don't forget.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もしい仲間たちだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What reliable friends I have.
MESSAGE.Translation: What reliable friends I have.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…謙吾のことだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...You're worried about Kengo, correct?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...You're worried about Kengo, correct?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「とりあえず、ぶっ倒そうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝For starters, let's just beat him up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝For starters, let's just beat him up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 絡的な仲間だった！
MESSAGE.EN: What simplistic friends I have!
MESSAGE.Translation: What simplistic friends I have!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「拳を突き合わせれば、自然と友情は生まれるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝When two men cross fists, a spontaneous friendship will be formed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝When two men cross fists, a spontaneous friendship will be formed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなものなのかなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that so...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that so...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレとおまえがそうだったじゃねぇか、何言ってやがんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't you believe me? That's exactly what happened to us two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't you believe me? That's exactly what happened to us two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは真人だからだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's only because it's you, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's only because it's you, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へ、まあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Heh, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Heh, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こいつ馬鹿にされたこときづいてないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He doesn't realize that he just got made fun of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He doesn't realize that he just got made fun of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ならそっとしておいてあげてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's put him aside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's put him aside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あん？　何が言いたいんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmm? What are you trying to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmm? What are you trying to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「つまりは、謙吾はそんな単純にはいかないってことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just mean that Kengo isn't as simplistic as you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just mean that Kengo isn't as simplistic as you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そいつはどうだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't agree.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't agree.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あいつのほうがよっぽど単純、なんてこともある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝He can be much simpler than me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝He can be much simpler than me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつもばかだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's just another idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's just another idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと前までの謙吾を思い出す。確かに、謙吾も真人とは違うベクトルの馬鹿だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I reminded myself how he had acted not long ago, and admitted that he was indeed an idiot in a different way from Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reminded myself how he had acted not long ago, and admitted that he was indeed an idiot in a different way from Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: がふわぁと猫のようにあくびをしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's mouth stretched into a great yawn just like a cat's.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's mouth stretched into a great yawn just like a cat's.

MESSAGE.JP: は時計を見る。もう０時を回っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the clock. It was already past midnight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the clock. It was already past midnight.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず今日はこのへんで切り上げよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, let's call it a day now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, let's call it a day now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…恭介、いる…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kyousuke, you there...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kyousuke, you there...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 屋は相変わらず真っ暗で、しんとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: His room was as dark and quiet as it had been before.
MESSAGE.Translation: His room was as dark and quiet as it had been before.

MESSAGE.JP: 画を踏みしめながら、ベッドに近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: Treading on comic books, I approached his bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Treading on comic books, I approached his bed.

MESSAGE.JP: り上がっている布団は、抜け殻だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The blanket was raised up, but no one was in there.
