MESSAGE.Translation: The blanket was raised up, but no one was in there.

MESSAGE.JP: た、そこに手を差し入れて、温もりが残っているか確かめる。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt the bedclothes with my hand to ascertain whether there was any trace of his warmth left.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt the bedclothes with my hand to ascertain whether there was any trace of his warmth left.

MESSAGE.JP: しだけそれは感じられた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could feel a little of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could feel a little of it.

MESSAGE.JP: もトイレにしては長すぎるな…。
MESSAGE.EN: But he was too long gone to have visited the bathroom...
MESSAGE.Translation: But he was too long gone to have visited the bathroom...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「ひとりか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝You came alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝You came alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: た背後から声がして僕は飛び上がりそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like the previous visit, a voice from behind caught me by surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like the previous visit, a voice from behind caught me by surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしていつも、そんなところにいるのさ…恐いよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How are you always back there...? You scared me out of my wits...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How are you always back there...? You scared me out of my wits...❞

MESSAGE.JP: り返ると、また部屋の隅、廊下からの明かりも届かない深い闇の中に恭介が佇んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Having turned around, I found Kyousuke standing deep in the darkness which even the lights of the hallway didn't reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having turned around, I found Kyousuke standing deep in the darkness which even the lights of the hallway didn't reach.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いきなりそこに現れたほうが恐いだろーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You'd be much more scared if I were to suddenly pop up from the bed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You'd be much more scared if I were to suddenly pop up from the bed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃそうだけど、どっちにしろ悪趣味だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's true, but I still don't really like that way you appear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's true, but I still don't really like that way you appear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなところで何してるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you doing there...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you doing there...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「寝てなくて大丈夫なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you need to get sleep?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you need to get sleep?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ずっと寝てるような生活さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Actually, I've been doing nothing but sleeping lately...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Actually, I've been doing nothing but sleeping lately...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 過ぎで今度は寝付けなくなったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: He had probably had too much sleep and now couldn't fall asleep?
MESSAGE.Translation: He had probably had too much sleep and now couldn't fall asleep?

MESSAGE.JP: 介はじっと僕のことを見つめていた。表情は暗くてよくわからないが…多分無表情なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He was staring at me without saying anything. I couldn't see his face... but somehow I was sure it was expressionless.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was staring at me without saying anything. I couldn't see his face... but somehow I was sure it was expressionless.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なんかあったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Is something bothering you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Is something bothering you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介はぼそっと訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: He murmured laconically.
MESSAGE.Translation: He murmured laconically.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけの反応ですらうれしい…。僕の身を案じていてくれることが。
MESSAGE.EN: Even that small question made me glad... because it told me he was worried about me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even that small question made me glad... because it told me he was worried about me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありすぎるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All too many things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All too many things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: わず弱音のようなことを口にしてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Without even meaning to, I found myself complaining aloud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without even meaning to, I found myself complaining aloud.

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま泣いてしまいたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Actually, what I really wanted to do was cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Actually, what I really wanted to do was cry.

MESSAGE.JP: 、恭介の胸に飛び込めたら、どれだけ僕は楽になれるだろう…？
MESSAGE.EN: How easy it would be to just rush into his arms right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: How easy it would be to just rush into his arms right now...

MESSAGE.JP: ―よしよし、よく頑張ったな。
MESSAGE.EN: ――There, there, you've done well.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――There, there, you've done well.

MESSAGE.JP: う言ってもらえたら、どれだけ報われるだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: How rewarded I would feel if he were to praise me that way right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: How rewarded I would feel if he were to praise me that way right now...

MESSAGE.JP: ―よし。理樹、ついてこい。俺が倒してやる。
MESSAGE.EN: ――All right, Riki, just follow me. I'll take down your enemy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――All right, Riki, just follow me. I'll take down your enemy.

MESSAGE.JP: う言ってもらえたら、どれだけ心強い気持ちになれるだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: How secure I would feel if he were to tell me that right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: How secure I would feel if he were to tell me that right now...

MESSAGE.JP: も、堪えた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I held myself back,
MESSAGE.Translation: But I held myself back,

MESSAGE.JP: を食いしばって。
MESSAGE.EN: gritting my teeth.
MESSAGE.Translation: gritting my teeth.

MESSAGE.JP: く耐えられたもんだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't believe that I managed to do it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't believe that I managed to do it...

MESSAGE.JP: 人事のようにそう思ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt as though those had been someone else's feelings entirely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt as though those had been someone else's feelings entirely.

MESSAGE.JP: もう立ち去ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I might as well leave here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I might as well leave here.

MESSAGE.JP: はここに何をしにきたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: What did I come here for?
MESSAGE.Translation: What did I come here for?

MESSAGE.JP: だ恭介の顔を見に来ただけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had just wanted to see him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had just wanted to see him.

MESSAGE.JP: られてよかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was glad I'd been able to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was glad I'd been able to.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちゃんと食べてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Be sure to eat properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Be sure to eat properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後にそれだけを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, that's all I said to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, that's all I said to him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあね、また」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事はなかったが、もう言うことがなくなったから、僕は部屋に戻ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: He didn't reply, but I had nothing else to say and turned to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: He didn't reply, but I had nothing else to say and turned to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…謙吾はひとつだけ嘘をついている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Kengo told you one lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Kengo told you one lie.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Eh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今、なんて言った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you just say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you just say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…腹が減ったからパンでも食う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I'm hungry. Guess I'll get some bread.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I'm hungry. Guess I'll get some bread.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、そうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, do so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, do so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ―謙吾はひとつだけ嘘をついている。
MESSAGE.EN: ――Kengo told you one lie.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Kengo told you one lie.

MESSAGE.JP: 介がひとつだけヒントをくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke gave me a hint.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke gave me a hint.

MESSAGE.JP: りがとう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank you...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank you...

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉を胸に刻み込んで、その夜は寝た。
MESSAGE.EN: That night, I fell asleep with his words carved into my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: That night, I fell asleep with his words carved into my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういえば、最近レノン見ないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come to think of it, I haven't seen Lennon lately.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come to think of it, I haven't seen Lennon lately.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は気づいていたのだろう。今更ながらに安易に口にしてしまった僕が馬鹿だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She must have noticed that long ago. How thoughtless of me to say something like that now, of all times.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must have noticed that long ago. How thoughtless of me to say something like that now, of all times.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれだけ律儀に鈴のことを毎日待ってたんだから、そのうちひょっこり戻ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He waited for you to get back dutifully every day, so I'm sure he'll be back soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He waited for you to get back dutifully every day, so I'm sure he'll be back soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずい、泣きそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is bad, she's about to cry.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is bad, she's about to cry.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういやね、昨日の晩、あれからまた恭介に会ってさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know what, I saw Kyousuke again after we parted last night...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know what, I saw Kyousuke again after we parted last night...❞

MESSAGE.JP: を逸らす。むしろ、こちらが本題だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I changed the subject fast; actually, this was what I'd wanted to talk about.
MESSAGE.Translation: I changed the subject fast; actually, this was what I'd wanted to talk about.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ヒントを教えてくれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He gave me a hint.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He gave me a hint.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…謙吾はひとつだけ嘘をついてるらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Apparently, Kengo told me one lie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Apparently, Kengo told me one lie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ほぅ…あいつらしくもねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hoh... That's unexpected of him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hoh... That's unexpected of him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「謙吾がレノンを隠したんだ、それが嘘だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He must be the one who hid Lennon. That's his lie!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He must be the one who hid Lennon. That's his lie!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんなもん隠してどうするんだよ、動機は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's the point of hiding the cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's the point of hiding the cat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「誘拐だ…これから身代金の交渉がはじまるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is a kidnapping... He's gonna send me a ransom demand soon...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is a kidnapping... He's gonna send me a ransom demand soon...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴、僕のゼリーもあげるから落ち着いてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, eat my jelly and calm down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, eat my jelly and calm down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こんなもの、食べるが、だまされないぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll eat it, but don't think that'll fool me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll eat it, but don't think that'll fool me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「誰も騙してないって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No one's fooling you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No one's fooling you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あいつほど趣味がなく、金のかからない奴が身代金もなにもないだろーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝In the first place, why would you think he needs ransom? He has no vices and no money problems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝In the first place, why would you think he needs ransom? He has no vices and no money problems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そーか、つながった!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's it, all the pieces have connected!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's it, all the pieces have connected!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「口からゼリー飛んでるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't spit the jelly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't spit the jelly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつが全部隠してるんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's the one hiding everything!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's the one hiding everything!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつは、猫だけの住む王国を作って、猫の国の王様になろうとしてるんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's going to build a cat kingdom and rule as its king!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's going to build a cat kingdom and rule as its king!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな子供みたいなこと、真剣に訴えられても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know what to do when you talk so seriously about such a childish idea...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know what to do when you talk so seriously about such a childish idea...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それだとたくさん嘘ついてることになんね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If it's the case, wouldn't that mean he lied more than once?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Seriously!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's how it's always been.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then why don't you do it if you think you can stay concentrated for a whole class, huh?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't even imagined the team would become this lively just by having Masato in it.

MESSAGE.JP: 人を相手に鈴も元気だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin appeared more energetic when she was around him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin appeared more energetic when she was around him.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり楽しい。

MESSAGE.Translation: I was having real fun.

MESSAGE.EN: This really was how it was meant to be.
MESSAGE.Translation: This really was how it was meant to be.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why don't you go next, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I guess I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I guess I will.❞

MESSAGE.EN: All that remained was just bringing Kengo and Kyousuke back.
MESSAGE.Translation: All that remained was just bringing Kengo and Kyousuke back.

MESSAGE.EN: I stood out of my chair.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood out of my chair.

MESSAGE.JP: 々に真人の隣だ。

MESSAGE.Translation: And sat down next to Masato for the first time in a while.

MESSAGE.JP: んだか落ち着く。
MESSAGE.EN: Just doing that made me feel somewhat relaxed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just doing that made me feel somewhat relaxed.

MESSAGE.EN: As I got my textbook and notebook ready on my desk, the teacher walked in.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I got my textbook and notebook ready on my desk, the teacher walked in.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「何して遊ぶ？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What should we play?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、遊びにきたんじゃないし、仮に遊びにきたんだとしても授業が始まるこのタイミングで誘うのはおかしいし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not back here to play with you. And even if I were, it'd still be weird for you to ask me to play with you the very moment class begins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not back here to play with you. And even if I were, it'd still be weird for you to ask me to play with you the very moment class begins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そっかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.EN: He looked away with his huge back bent.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked away with his huge back bent.

MESSAGE.JP: 立、礼、着席。

MESSAGE.Translation: We stood up, bowed and sat back down again.

MESSAGE.JP: てられないことを祈りつつ、ひたすら謙吾の観察に集中することにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Hoping the teacher wouldn't have me answer any questions, I intently focused all my attention on Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hoping the teacher wouldn't have me answer any questions, I intently focused all my attention on Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: しゴムを取り出す、それだけの動作だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw him take out an eraser.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw him take out an eraser.

MESSAGE.JP: の中に不自然さを感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like there was something wrong in that process.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like there was something wrong in that process.

MESSAGE.JP: 左手を使った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He used his left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He used his left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: れたほうの手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the hand which was injured.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the hand which was injured.

MESSAGE.JP: びが入った程度だから、ちょっとぐらい動かすことはなんら問題ないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He should be able to move it a bit, since it was only a small fracture.
MESSAGE.Translation: He should be able to move it a bit, since it was only a small fracture.

MESSAGE.JP: しゴムを取り出す、それだけの動作だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He had merely picked up an eraser.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had merely picked up an eraser.

MESSAGE.JP: 動域も狭い。
MESSAGE.EN: Furthermore, the range of the motion was very narrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Furthermore, the range of the motion was very narrow.

MESSAGE.JP: ブスをつけたほうの手でも構わないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence, I thought at first that it wasn't worth paying attention to.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence, I thought at first that it wasn't worth paying attention to.

MESSAGE.JP: も、その後すぐ、右手で取り直した。
MESSAGE.EN: However, in the very next moment, he switched to his right hand and picked up the eraser again.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, in the very next moment, he switched to his right hand and picked up the eraser again.

MESSAGE.JP: れは何を指す？
MESSAGE.EN: Why would he do that?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why would he do that?

MESSAGE.JP: みが走ったから？
MESSAGE.EN: Because his hand hurt?
MESSAGE.Translation: Because his hand hurt?

MESSAGE.JP: う簡単に理由はつく。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the simplest explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the simplest explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、今僕は、謙吾の動作から不自然さを感じとった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I did feel something out of place in his motion.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I did feel something out of place in his motion.

MESSAGE.JP: れは『焦り』の感情だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a sense of ❛hurry.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a sense of ❛hurry.❜

MESSAGE.JP: みが走っただけなら、それはでてこないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Would he hasten to do that just because the hand hurt?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would he hasten to do that just because the hand hurt?

MESSAGE.JP: ら…
MESSAGE.EN: It was...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was...

MESSAGE.JP: まぐれ…なのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Because... he just felt like doing it?
MESSAGE.Translation: Because... he just felt like doing it?

MESSAGE.JP: んな馬鹿な…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, right...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, right...

MESSAGE.JP: 自身も動揺しているようだ。謙吾と同じように。
MESSAGE.EN: I seem to be as out of sorts as Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seem to be as out of sorts as Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 静に考えるならば…今の謙吾の動作。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's analyze it calmly... What did his behavior mean...
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's analyze it calmly... What did his behavior mean...

MESSAGE.JP: 我をしていることを思い出したからじゃないのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Didn't he just remind himself that his left arm was injured?
MESSAGE.Translation: Didn't he just remind himself that his left arm was injured?

MESSAGE.JP: う。まさしく、手にした瞬間に、怪我していることを思い出したような…
MESSAGE.EN: He recalled it at the very moment he picked up his eraser...
MESSAGE.Translation: He recalled it at the very moment he picked up his eraser...

MESSAGE.JP: んな焦りを含んだ、ぎこちなさがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: And I suspected that was why he behaved awkwardly.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I suspected that was why he behaved awkwardly.

MESSAGE.JP: みが走ったからという理由でも、同じ挙動になるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if he had simply felt a pain in the arm, he would have reacted the same way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if he had simply felt a pain in the arm, he would have reacted the same way.

MESSAGE.JP: も、この具体性を持たない『焦り』の感情はでてこないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But in that case, there wouldn't have been that sense of ❛hurry❜ I felt.
MESSAGE.Translation: But in that case, there wouldn't have been that sense of ❛hurry❜ I felt.

MESSAGE.JP: 当に小さなものだったけど、僕はそれを感じ取った。
MESSAGE.EN: It was small enough to be negligible, but it did tell me something.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was small enough to be negligible, but it did tell me something.

MESSAGE.JP: らば、それが謙吾のついてる嘘。
MESSAGE.EN: It told me what Kengo was lying about.
MESSAGE.Translation: It told me what Kengo was lying about.

MESSAGE.JP: まぐれ…なのか？

MESSAGE.Translation: Is that... really why?

MESSAGE.JP: ど、今僕は、謙吾の動作から不自然さを感じとった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I did feel something out of place in his motion.

MESSAGE.JP: れは『焦り』の感情だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a sense of ❛hurry.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a sense of ❛hurry.❜

MESSAGE.JP: まぐれならば、それはでてこないはずだ。

MESSAGE.JP: ら…
MESSAGE.EN: It was...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was...

MESSAGE.JP: みが走ったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because his hand hurt?
MESSAGE.Translation: Because his hand hurt?

MESSAGE.JP: んな馬鹿な…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, right...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, right...

MESSAGE.JP: こまで導きだしておいて、そんな答えにはならない。
MESSAGE.EN: I've come this far, I need to stop fooling around.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've come this far, I need to stop fooling around.

MESSAGE.EN: Didn't he just remind himself that his left arm was injured?

MESSAGE.EN: Kengo wasn't in the classroom now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo wasn't in the classroom now.

MESSAGE.Translation: There were only a couple of female students left here besides us.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well? What came out of his eyes?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, nothing came out of his eyes.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I did see something I can't ignore.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I hate to say this, knowing how badly you want to make him eat an eraser, but he just picked it up.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't mind it. So, what does that tell you?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You forgot? His left arm is injured right now.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: When did I last hear either of them give such a sensible opinion on anything? (I'm quite sure those two made Kyousuke endlessly tired like this too, until Kengo joined...)

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We need to make certain of it.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By forcing him to use his left arm.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Got any specific ideas?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いい質問だ。発案のしがいもあるってものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Good question. This was the challenge I needed to answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Good question. This was the challenge I needed to answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「例えば、壁が迫ってくる…これは両手を使って阻止しなくちゃならない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For example, we sandwich him between two walls... and he'll have to use both hands to stop them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For example, we sandwich him between two walls... and he'll have to use both hands to stop them.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sounds like heavy work... that's my cue.❞

MESSAGE.EN: ...Good, you know the score, Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Good, you know the score, Masato.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I need you to push one of the walls. Of course, we won't use a real one. I'll get you a partition which looks like one.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝However, considering his physical performance, chances are good that he'll bail before he's caught by the walls.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We need something to keep him from doing that...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I thought hard with my brow furrowed.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What about a trap like a Roach Motel?❞

MESSAGE.EN: Rin made a proposal.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin made a proposal.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいね。でも動く壁にホイホイはちょっと大がかりすぎるな」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's good, but I don't think we can make one his size.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とえそれが使い物にならないアイデアだったとしても、僕の思考を刺激してくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I couldn't put her idea into practice, it did inspire me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I couldn't put her idea into practice, it did inspire me.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This may be a bit of a dirty trick, but here's an idea. We place a doll wrapped in a blanket inside the trap.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How will that work?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When the wall starts moving, Rin, you change your voice and yell out something like ❛My daughter's still there!❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When the wall starts moving, Rin, you change your voice and yell out something like ❛My daughter's still there!❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ほぅ…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝O-hoh...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To save the doll, rather than fleeing from the trap, Kengo has no choice but to voluntarily enter it.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really am designing something bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえのおもしろそうは、力勝負の一点だろ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're only interested in the part where you push the wall at him.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, let's get to work. We're gonna get the materials from the art and craft rooms, and build a wall-like partition.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A wall will suddenly emerge where there's normally no wall, huh...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: We were now standing in front of the sink in the boys' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「囮があるから大丈夫だよ、そこまで気は回らないはず。とにかく赤ちゃんが危険にさらされている状況は変わらないからね」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We have the fake baby as a decoy. As long as it's in danger, he should end up acting as I've planned.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That makes sense.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That makes sense.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「入ってみて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Get yourself in there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Get yourself in there.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and I left Masato at the sink and, from the hallway side, pushed the partition in front of him.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now push it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らりと揺らいだ。

MESSAGE.Translation: The wall partition shook.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ゆっくりと一定の速度でだよ。慎重に」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Keep a slow and a steady pace. Careful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずずずず…

MESSAGE.Translation: *Zuzuzuzu*...

MESSAGE.Translation: It felt just as if a wall was closing up on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おお、それっぽいなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, that does look like it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, that does look like it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いい感じだ。真人はＯＫだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Great. Masato, do it just like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Great. Masato, do it just like that.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now's your turn, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Considering the best angle carefully, I placed a blanket-wrapped white teddy bear on the floor.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo will come from over there. Rin, you stand here with your back to him.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I held her shoulders and moved her into place.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now, the wall is coming for the baby. Rin, give it a shout.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh my... it actually is a moving wall!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How come you sound like you've seen one before?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Because I've seen them in anime and movies. I'm sure I'd say that if I saw one in person. That's realism, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That'd just make Kengo pay attention only to the wall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That'd just make Kengo pay attention only to the wall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そーだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「まったくそーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's absolutely right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's absolutely right.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You didn't have to agree twice. Just follow the script.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded with a ding of the bell.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded with a ding of the bell.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「壁がごごごご…と迫ってくる。はい、叫んで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now, the wall is moving. Shout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now, the wall is moving. Shout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「か、壁があぁぁぁーーー!!　しかも下には、な、なんと…赤ちゃんだーーーーー!!」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh my, the wall's moving!! And, oh my... there's a baby on the floor!!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't that supposed to be your baby?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that supposed to be your baby?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そーだが、なにか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yes, so what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yes, so what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんか実況っぽくて、とてもじゃないけど我が子を案じてるようには聞こえないんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I felt like you were just doing a live coverage on the events. You sounded far from being worried about your own child.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I felt like you were just doing a live coverage on the events. You sounded far from being worried about your own child.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あ、そーか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ah, that's right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ah, that's right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その二度納得するのは鈴の中で今ちょっと流行ってて僕も面白いとは思うけど、それを言わないで済むように次はちゃんと作戦通りに芝居してね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Your sudden fancy of agreeing twice like that is most interesting, but I need you to play your role like I'm telling you next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Your sudden fancy of agreeing twice like that is most interesting, but I need you to play your role like I'm telling you next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: Her bell chimed again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her bell chimed again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「壁がごごごご…と迫ってくる。はい、叫んで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now, the wall is moving. Shout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now, the wall is moving. Shout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「か、壁があぁぁぁーーー!!　ローーーレーーーーンス!!」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh my, the wall's moving!! Lawrence!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Lawrence...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The name makes me think of a soldier rather than a baby... Could it be that you picked it up from a war novel or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「かなりナチュラルにでてきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It came out very naturally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It came out very naturally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ…まあ、それはじゃあ鈴の案ということで尊重しよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝'Kay... Well, I suppose I'll respect your idea for the baby's name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝'Kay... Well, I suppose I'll respect your idea for the baby's name.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I need you to make it more obvious. Stretch your arm toward the baby so Kengo understands who this Lawrence is.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝At least pretend that the doll is something precious to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You've got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You've got it.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't understand why you answered with such confidence... Well, whatever... Now, I'm gonna explain the details. Masato, you listen too.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Masato only pushed his face out through the gap between the partition and the real wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「壁が迫ってくるよりこわいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You look a lot more scary than the moving wall...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You look a lot more scary than the moving wall...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいから注目。重要だから、よく聞いててよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Pay attention to me. This is very important, so listen carefully, all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Pay attention to me. This is very important, so listen carefully, all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕は隠れて謙吾を待っている」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I hide somewhere near the entrance and wait for Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「帰ってきたら、携帯を１コールだけ鳴らして切るからバイブレーションだけの設定にして、震えたら触らなくてもわかるポケットにいれておくように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝When I see him enter the dorm, I give both of you a one-ring call. Put your phones on vibration mode so you can notice my calls with your phones in your pockets.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝When I see him enter the dorm, I give both of you a one-ring call. Put your phones on vibration mode so you can notice my calls with your phones in your pockets.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝After that, I slip back into our room and covertly watch the hallway through the chink of the door.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾が鈴の背後近くまできたら、もう一回コールする。それが合図だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Once Kengo is almost up to Rin, I call you guys again. That's the go sign.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Once Kengo is almost up to Rin, I call you guys again. That's the go sign.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人は壁を動かす。鈴は叫ぶ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, you move the wall, and Rin, you yell out for help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got that all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got that all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の指示にふたりが頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of them nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of them nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ミッション、スタート！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mission Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mission Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: く開いた隙間の向こう…
MESSAGE.EN: Through the narrow gap...
MESSAGE.Translation: Through the narrow gap...

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の胴着が見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could see Kengo's kendo uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could see Kengo's kendo uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: たりに携帯で合図を送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I made the calls.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made the calls.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「か、壁があぁぁぁーーー!!　ローーーレーーーーンス!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh my, the wall's moving!! Lawrence!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh my, the wall's moving!! Lawrence!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: きなり大声を上げられ驚いて目を見張る謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: Astonished by her sudden scream, Kengo opened his eyes wide.
MESSAGE.Translation: Astonished by her sudden scream, Kengo opened his eyes wide.

MESSAGE.JP: の先では…
MESSAGE.EN: In front of his eyes...
MESSAGE.Translation: In front of his eyes...

MESSAGE.JP: ごごごごご…
MESSAGE.EN: *Guruguruguru*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Guruguruguru*...

MESSAGE.JP: が動き出している。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a wall creeping straight toward the fake baby.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a wall creeping straight toward the fake baby.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何事だ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's happening!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's happening!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ローレンスが！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My Lawrence!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My Lawrence!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ローレンス!?　大事なものなのか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Lawrence!? Is that something important to you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Lawrence!? Is that something important to you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり赤ん坊とは思われていない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I kind of knew he wouldn't recognize it as a baby...
MESSAGE.Translation: I kind of knew he wouldn't recognize it as a baby...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「わけがわからないが、やむをえまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but it seems that my help is needed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but it seems that my help is needed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言いつつも、果敢に飛び込んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: Nonetheless, he bravely ventured in.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nonetheless, he bravely ventured in.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が右腕で人形を拾い上げる。その時、壁が一気に押し潰そうと迫った。
MESSAGE.EN: As he picked up the doll with his right hand, the wall sped toward him and tried to crash into him.
MESSAGE.Translation: As he picked up the doll with his right hand, the wall sped toward him and tried to crash into him.

MESSAGE.JP: っ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Stretch*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Stretch*!

MESSAGE.JP: ブスを巻いた腕で、それを制した。
MESSAGE.EN: He extended the plastered arm and received the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: He extended the plastered arm and received the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: の進行が止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: The wall stopped in its tracks.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wall stopped in its tracks.

MESSAGE.JP: の均衡を保ったまま…時間だけが経過していく。
MESSAGE.EN: Since their powers were evenly matched... only time kept ticking by.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since their powers were evenly matched... only time kept ticking by.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾の真剣な横顔…その口元がさらにキツく結ばれた。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw Kengo's serious profile... and his lips get pressed into a tighter and tighter line.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw Kengo's serious profile... and his lips get pressed into a tighter and tighter line.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もういいよ、真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's enough, Masato!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's enough, Masato!❞

MESSAGE.JP: アを開け放ち、僕は飛び出していった。
MESSAGE.EN: I threw the door open and darted out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I threw the door open and darted out.

MESSAGE.JP: 人が本気を出す前に止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to stop Masato before he got more serious.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to stop Masato before he got more serious.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ…これからって時に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the heck...? I was getting to the good part.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the heck...? I was getting to the good part.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これ以上やると、謙吾が本当に怪我しちゃうよ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You have to stop, or else Kengo will really get injured.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo, who had been kneeling on the floor, stood up with his left arm hanging limply.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「鈴、ローレンスだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Rin, here, Lawrence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Rin, here, Lawrence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を振り返ると、腕の中の人形を投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned to face her and threw her the doll.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned to face her and threw her the doll.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれをひょいとよけた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a light step aside and dodged it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a light step aside and dodged it.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こらこら、大事なものなんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hey, it's important to you, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hey, it's important to you, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm sorry, but...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't have any children.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't have any children.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「え？　そういう設定だったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Eh? Is that what the thing was supposed to be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Eh? Is that what the thing was supposed to be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: のほうを振り返り、見た。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned around and eyed me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned around and eyed me.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どういうことだ、理樹。説明してもらおうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What is this all about, Riki? You must explain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What is this all about, Riki? You must explain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾は僕らに嘘をついていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You lied to us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You lied to us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「折れた腕じゃ、あんな抵抗はできなかったはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You couldn't have resisted the wall like that with an injured arm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You couldn't have resisted the wall like that with an injured arm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…そんなことを暴くために？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...You guys did this just to uncover that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...You guys did this just to uncover that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人や鈴を見回した。
MESSAGE.EN: He looked around at Rin and Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looked around at Rin and Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりが頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Only I nodded to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only I nodded to him.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は目を細めた。
MESSAGE.EN: His eyes narrowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: His eyes narrowed.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは…何をしたいんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What... do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What... do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはこっちの質問だよ、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's my question, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's my question, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな嘘までついて、どうしたかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did you lie about your arm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did you lie about your arm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…わからないのか？　そんな簡単なことも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Don't you know? That should be easy to figure out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Don't you know? That should be easy to figure out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろたえるな…考えろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Stay calm and think.
MESSAGE.Translation: Stay calm and think.

MESSAGE.JP: は謙吾の言葉に動揺もせず、そう自分を諭した。
MESSAGE.EN: I told myself not to be bewildered by his words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told myself not to be bewildered by his words.

MESSAGE.JP: 考えるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I must think.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I must think.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は腕を怪我した直後から、変わった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo had changed soon after his arm got injured.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo had changed soon after his arm got injured.

MESSAGE.JP: 活動の拘束から放たれ時間ができてから、馬鹿みたいに遊ぶようになった。真人までも引くほどに。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of the injury, he had stopped attending the kendo club and began fooling around like crazy, which freaked even Masato out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of the injury, he had stopped attending the kendo club and began fooling around like crazy, which freaked even Masato out.

MESSAGE.JP: 活動が嫌だったのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Did he not like the club?
MESSAGE.Translation: Did he not like the club?

MESSAGE.JP: しかして、本当は剣道すらも嫌いだった？
MESSAGE.EN: Could it be that he actually didn't even like kendo itself?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could it be that he actually didn't even like kendo itself?

MESSAGE.JP: 我をしていなかったら、大会へ向けて剣道の練習を続けざるをえなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: If not for the injury, he would have had to keep practicing for the tournament.
MESSAGE.Translation: If not for the injury, he would have had to keep practicing for the tournament.

MESSAGE.JP: から、怪我をした振りをしていた？
MESSAGE.EN: Is that why he's been pretending to be injured?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that why he's been pretending to be injured?

MESSAGE.JP: しそうだったとしたら…。
MESSAGE.EN: If that's the case...
MESSAGE.Translation: If that's the case...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら僕たちだけにでも話してくれればよかったのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You could have told us, at least...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You could have told us, at least...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「言えば、おまえはリトルバスターズをやめてくれるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If I had, would you have disbanded the Little Busters?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If I had, would you have disbanded the Little Busters?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐさま僕は、謎という奈落の底に突き落とされた。
MESSAGE.EN: That question of his quickly pushed me down into the murky depths of a riddle again.
MESSAGE.Translation: That question of his quickly pushed me down into the murky depths of a riddle again.

MESSAGE.JP: れとこれとはまったく関係ないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: That had nothing whatsoever to do with this, did it?
MESSAGE.Translation: That had nothing whatsoever to do with this, did it?

MESSAGE.JP: しろ、リトルバスターズが謙吾にとって逃げ場だったはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather, the Little Busters should be the place where he could feel at ease.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather, the Little Busters should be the place where he could feel at ease.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…矛盾していない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't that... contradictory?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that... contradictory?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は眉をひそめた。
MESSAGE.EN: He frowned.
MESSAGE.Translation: He frowned.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺から言わせると、矛盾してるのは、おまえのほうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝From my point of view, you are the one who's doing something contradictory here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝From my point of view, you are the one who's doing something contradictory here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうして…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How so...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How so...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「じゃあ、教えてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, I'll tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, I'll tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえが辿る行き先を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝About the destination you're heading for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝About the destination you're heading for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は息が止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: His words made me stop breathing.
MESSAGE.Translation: His words made me stop breathing.

MESSAGE.JP: れは僕がずっと知りたかったものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was what I had been longing to know.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was what I had been longing to know.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾はそれを知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: And he had the knowledge.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he had the knowledge.

MESSAGE.JP: して、今僕はそれを聞こうとしている…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to learn it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to learn it...

MESSAGE.JP: や、聞かされようとしているんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, I was about to be made to know it...
MESSAGE.Translation: No, I was about to be made to know it...

MESSAGE.JP: 吾がゆっくり口を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: He slowly opened his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: He slowly opened his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「その先に待つのは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What awaits you there is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What awaits you there is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「暗闇だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Darkness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Darkness.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Eh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「一筋の光も射さない…暗闇のただ中だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You will be cast right into the heart of the darkness... where not even a ray of light can find its way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You will be cast right into the heart of the darkness... where not even a ray of light can find its way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: から、底へ。
MESSAGE.EN: The ground fell from under me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ground fell from under me.

MESSAGE.JP: けがわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: His words made no sense.
MESSAGE.Translation: His words made no sense.

MESSAGE.JP: 考を停止してしまいそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost stopped thinking altogether.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost stopped thinking altogether.

MESSAGE.JP: れほど混乱している。
MESSAGE.EN: That's how badly his words confused me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's how badly his words confused me.

MESSAGE.JP: が一番知りたかったことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He just told me what I'd craved to know more than anything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: He just told me what I'd craved to know more than anything else.

MESSAGE.JP: は恭介の代わりとなって、リトルバスターズを結成して、そしてさらにその先、どんな場所へ向かおうとしているのか。
MESSAGE.EN: As Kyousuke's substitute, I had begun building the Little Busters, all the while wondering what kind of place I was headed for.
MESSAGE.Translation: As Kyousuke's substitute, I had begun building the Little Busters, all the while wondering what kind of place I was headed for.

MESSAGE.JP: は今…暗闇のただ中に向かっているという。
MESSAGE.EN: And I was just told that... my journey would end in the depths of darkness.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I was just told that... my journey would end in the depths of darkness.

MESSAGE.JP: 闇とは具体的にどういう状態を指す？
MESSAGE.EN: What kind of darkness does he mean?
MESSAGE.Translation: What kind of darkness does he mean?

MESSAGE.JP: こでは一体何が起きた？
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world had happened in there?
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world had happened in there?

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は何を知っている？
MESSAGE.EN: And what does Kengo know about it?
MESSAGE.Translation: And what does Kengo know about it?

MESSAGE.JP: 問だ…。質問をして、話を引っ張って、もっと手がかりを得るんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've got to ask... I've got to ask something to keep the conversation going, so I can salvage more clues from him...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got to ask... I've got to ask something to keep the conversation going, so I can salvage more clues from him...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…何が起きたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「答えてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tell me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tell me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕が向かう先で、何が起きたのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened at the place I'm heading right now...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened at the place I'm heading right now...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんなことは理樹、おまえは知らなくていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki, you don't have to know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki, you don't have to know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「知るべきなのは『今』を守る方法だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What you need to know is how to protect the ❛now.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What you need to know is how to protect the ❛now.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And that is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And that is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「リトルバスターズの結成をここで断念することだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Give up on forming the Little Busters right here, right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Give up on forming the Little Busters right here, right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もし、そうしてくれるのなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺は一生おまえを守ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I will protect you to the last.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I will protect you to the last.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬僕は、謙吾にすべてを委ねてしまいたい、そう思ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: For a second, I so badly wanted to put everything in his hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a second, I so badly wanted to put everything in his hands.

MESSAGE.JP: うしたら、きっと楽になれる。
MESSAGE.EN: If I did so, I could rest assured.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I did so, I could rest assured.

MESSAGE.JP: 介も今はあの状態だ。
MESSAGE.EN: While Kyousuke wasn't who he used to be at the moment,
MESSAGE.Translation: While Kyousuke wasn't who he used to be at the moment,

MESSAGE.JP: れに対し、今目の前に立つ謙吾の、なんと頼もしいことか。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think I'd ever seen anyone look as reliable as the Kengo who now stood before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think I'd ever seen anyone look as reliable as the Kengo who now stood before me.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は強い。
MESSAGE.EN: He was strong.
MESSAGE.Translation: He was strong.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾さえいてくれれば、何にも負けない気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: With just him by my side, I would be safe from everything and everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: With just him by my side, I would be safe from everything and everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: れほど頼もしい存在だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's how dependable he looked to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's how dependable he looked to me.

MESSAGE.JP: の謙吾が…一生だぞ？
MESSAGE.EN: And he had just said... to the last?
MESSAGE.Translation: And he had just said... to the last?

MESSAGE.JP: 生味方でいてくれるという。
MESSAGE.EN: He so simply offered to protect me for the rest of my life,
MESSAGE.Translation: He so simply offered to protect me for the rest of my life,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がここで、リトルバスターズの結成を断念すれば。
MESSAGE.EN: if I, as he asked, gave up on forming the Little Busters here.
MESSAGE.Translation: if I, as he asked, gave up on forming the Little Busters here.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけのことでいいのか、とさえ思ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: His offer sounded so good that I found myself starting to consider accepting it.
MESSAGE.Translation: His offer sounded so good that I found myself starting to consider accepting it.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけのことでこれから先、謙吾は僕のそばに居続けてくれるのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Just by giving up on the team, I would be able to have Kengo by me forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just by giving up on the team, I would be able to have Kengo by me forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ここまでよく頑張ったな、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm proud of everything you've done until now, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm proud of everything you've done until now, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後は俺に任せて、おまえは休め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can rest now, and leave it all to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can rest now, and leave it all to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うか…そういえば、僕は疲れてたんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, that's right... I really feel so tired.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, that's right... I really feel so tired.

MESSAGE.JP: んだかこれまでずっと大変なことを続けてきた気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I feel like I've been through so many demanding things...
MESSAGE.Translation: I feel like I've been through so many demanding things...

MESSAGE.JP: 吾に任せれば、もう僕は休んでいいのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I hand them over to him, I can rest easy...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I hand them over to him, I can rest easy...

MESSAGE.JP: こでバトンタッチすれば…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I pass him the torch here...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I pass him the torch here...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕はやめない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not quitting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not quitting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も。
MESSAGE.EN: But.
MESSAGE.Translation: But.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも僕は前を見据えて、進むんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I still need to see where I'm going.
MESSAGE.Translation: I still need to see where I'm going.

MESSAGE.JP: つかのどこかの世界で僕は決めたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In a world somewhere, this is what I've decided.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a world somewhere, this is what I've decided.

MESSAGE.JP: くなるって。
MESSAGE.EN: I've decided to be stronger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've decided to be stronger.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうして…自らそんな場所に向かう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why... do you seek such a place...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why... do you seek such a place...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「悲しいことがあったからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because there was something that made me sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because there was something that made me sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うそんな思い、したくない。させたくない。
MESSAGE.EN: I never want to feel like that again, and I never want to make anyone else feel like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I never want to feel like that again, and I never want to make anyone else feel like that.

MESSAGE.JP: から、堪えるんだ。ここでも。
MESSAGE.EN: That is why I need to endure here, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is why I need to endure here, too.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは…そんなもの知らなくていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki... you don't have to know of that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki... you don't have to know of that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、知らなくちゃいけないんだ、僕は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, I need to know it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, I need to know it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、僕はリトルバスターズを…あの日の５人をもう一度集める」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, I'm going to gather the Little Busters... gather the five of us back together once again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, I'm going to gather the Little Busters... gather the five of us back together once again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なら、俺はついていくことはできない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, I cannot follow you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, I cannot follow you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「お別れだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Goodbye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Goodbye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が目を伏せ、歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Casting down his eyes, he began to walk out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Casting down his eyes, he began to walk out.

MESSAGE.JP: の脇を抜けていく。
MESSAGE.EN: He passed me by.
MESSAGE.Translation: He passed me by.

MESSAGE.JP: 何も言わず、見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: No one said a thing as we watched him go.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one said a thing as we watched him go.

MESSAGE.JP: きり直しだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: We were right back where we had started...
MESSAGE.Translation: We were right back where we had started...

MESSAGE.JP: う『何かが起きた世界』で、何が起きたかは問題じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking whatever ❜had happened❜ in that other world was not important.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking whatever ❜had happened❜ in that other world was not important.

MESSAGE.JP: は、立ち向かう気持ちでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was ready to stand up to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was ready to stand up to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 間が経つにつれ、はっきりしてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: The more time went by, the clearer it became.
MESSAGE.Translation: The more time went by, the clearer it became.

MESSAGE.JP: の感情だけは揺るぎないものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Only this feeling I could not shake.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only this feeling I could not shake.

MESSAGE.JP: れはいつか、その世界で僕が固く決心したのだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember exactly when it was, but I was certain I had firmly made up my mind in the other world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember exactly when it was, but I was certain I had firmly made up my mind in the other world.

MESSAGE.JP: こに何が待つのか…その不安はもう忘れよう。
MESSAGE.EN: What awaited after all this... I'll just stop concerning myself over it.
MESSAGE.Translation: What awaited after all this... I'll just stop concerning myself over it.

MESSAGE.JP: 要なのは、立ち向かう勇気、それだけでいい。
MESSAGE.EN: The courage to stand up to it, that was all I needed right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: The courage to stand up to it, that was all I needed right now.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もういいじゃないか、あんな奴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's just forget about that guy already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's just forget about that guy already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とり黙って考え込む僕に鈴がそう言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin suggested as I was pondering in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin suggested as I was pondering in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな言い方したら駄目だよ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we can't do that, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we can't do that, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちゃんとローレンスを守ってくれただろ。鈴はよけてたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You saw him help Lawrence out. Even though you dodged the doll.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You saw him help Lawrence out. Even though you dodged the doll.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾は鈴のこともちゃんと友達として思ってくれてるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That means he still considers you his friend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That means he still considers you his friend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも理樹がリトルバスターを作るならおわかれだと言ってたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But he said he couldn't follow you if you kept building the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But he said he couldn't follow you if you kept building the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やめるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you gonna quit it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you gonna quit it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やめない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ、謙吾はおわかれになるぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then, you're going to part with him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then, you're going to part with him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「させない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not that either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not that either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「むずかしいこと言うな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're asking for too much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're asking for too much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そのふたつはどーじに成り立つのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Do you think those two things will be able to go together?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Do you think those two things will be able to go together?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「成り立たせる…どんなことをしてでも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm going to make it so... whatever it takes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going to make it so... whatever it takes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふーむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も考え始めたのか、腕組みをして黙る。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be thinking as well, as she fell silent with her arms folded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be thinking as well, as she fell silent with her arms folded.

MESSAGE.JP: の上に腰をかけていた真人がよっとかけ声をひとつあげて立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, sitting on the desk, got to his feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, sitting on the desk, got to his feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「やっぱ、倒そうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just as I said before, let's just defeat him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just as I said before, let's just defeat him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言って拳を固める。
MESSAGE.EN: He clenched his hand into a hard fist.
MESSAGE.Translation: He clenched his hand into a hard fist.

MESSAGE.JP: す、か…。
MESSAGE.EN: Defeating him...
MESSAGE.Translation: Defeating him...

MESSAGE.JP: ならまんざらでもない案な気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: The idea was starting to sound more and more reasonable.
MESSAGE.Translation: The idea was starting to sound more and more reasonable.

MESSAGE.JP: でねじ伏せる。
MESSAGE.EN: Taking him down by force.
MESSAGE.Translation: Taking him down by force.

MESSAGE.JP: に言えば、それ以外方法はないのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, there may not be any other way left available for us.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, there may not be any other way left available for us.

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕に謙吾を倒せるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: But was it possible for me to beat him?
MESSAGE.Translation: But was it possible for me to beat him?

MESSAGE.JP: 人の時のように狡猾に罠をしかけて？
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I could use an artful trick like with Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I could use an artful trick like with Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: れで勝ったとして、謙吾を従えさせることができるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: But even if I were to win that way, would Kengo ever agree to obey me?
MESSAGE.Translation: But even if I were to win that way, would Kengo ever agree to obey me?

MESSAGE.JP: 吾のことだ。恐らく真剣勝負じゃないと納得しないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew him well enough to know that he would never accept my challenge unless it was a serious fight.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew him well enough to know that he would never accept my challenge unless it was a serious fight.

MESSAGE.JP: そこで思いつく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That sparked a thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That sparked a thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「力勝負でなければ勝ち目はあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it's something other than a battle of strength, the odds will be in our favor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it's something other than a battle of strength, the odds will be in our favor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が握り拳を固めて倒すという言葉を繰り返していたから、力勝負以外の選択肢があることを忘れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Since Masato had kept talking about how we should beat him up, I had completely overlooked that.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since Masato had kept talking about how we should beat him up, I had completely overlooked that.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　ぶっ倒さねぇの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? We're not gonna take him down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? We're not gonna take him down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「倒すけど、ぶっ倒す必要まではないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We are, but not by violence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We are, but not by violence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「じゃあ、なんで倒すんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then how are we gonna beat him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then how are we gonna beat him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れが問題だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was indeed the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was indeed the question.

MESSAGE.JP: なにがいい？
MESSAGE.EN: ...What would be the best way?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What would be the best way?

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が受けてくれそうなものでなければ意味がない。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't matter what we came up with if Kengo didn't agree to do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't matter what we came up with if Kengo didn't agree to do it.

MESSAGE.JP: ち目があって、僕に向いてそうなもの…。
MESSAGE.EN: Something that we could win and I could easily do...
MESSAGE.Translation: Something that we could win and I could easily do...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「やきゅーだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　鈴、今何か言った？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Rin, did you just say something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Rin, did you just say something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「やきゅーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きゅー…野球。
MESSAGE.EN: Baseball... Baseball.
MESSAGE.Translation: Baseball... Baseball.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、野球!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, baseball!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, baseball!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いきなりだね…どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That was sudden... Why baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That was sudden... Why baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえ、なんか打ちそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I think you're a good hitter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I think you're a good hitter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、鈴の前で打ったことなんてないんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I've never batted in front of you, Rin...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I've never batted in front of you, Rin...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そーか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、鈴とはキャッチボールしかしたことないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we've just played catch...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we've just played catch...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも、いいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But that doesn't really matter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But that doesn't really matter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ここはやきゅーだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We should do baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We should do baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「野球得意でもないし、打つほうは体育の時間でしかやったことないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Baseball isn't something I'm good at, and I've never done batting except in gym class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Baseball isn't something I'm good at, and I've never done batting except in gym class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか？　おまえなんか打ちそうだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you sure? You look like a pretty good hitter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you sure? You look like a pretty good hitter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何を根拠に言ってるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just what is that based on...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just what is that based on...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふいんき」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Your atmosphere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Your atmosphere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「雰囲気？　そんなのでわかるわけないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝My atmosphere? How can you tell if someone's a good batter or not from their atmosphere...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝My atmosphere? How can you tell if someone's a good batter or not from their atmosphere...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You agree, don't you, Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You agree, don't you, Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どちらかというと打ちそうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I think you'd hit well, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I think you'd hit well, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええぇぇーー!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehhhhhh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehhhhhh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕の運動神経の悪さ、体育の時間で知ってるでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should know how terrible I'm at sports, since we have P.E. together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should know how terrible I'm at sports, since we have P.E. together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それとこれとは別だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This and that are two different things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This and that are two different things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一緒だよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No they're not!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No they're not!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと待ってよ、わけがわからない、ふたりがなぜそこまで推すのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on a second, I don't understand. Why are you guys making me out to be a good hitter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on a second, I don't understand. Why are you guys making me out to be a good hitter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「別にオレは推しやしない。ただ打ちそうだなと思っただけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm not making you out to be one. I just think you are one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm not making you out to be one. I just think you are one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一緒だよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's the same thing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's the same thing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと待ってよ、わけがわからない、ふたりがなぜそこまで推すのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on a second, I don't understand. Why are you guys making me out to be a good hitter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on a second, I don't understand. Why are you guys making me out to be a good hitter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえさっきも同じセリフ言ったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You said the same line a couple seconds ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You said the same line a couple seconds ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹にしてはすげぇ取り乱しようだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I didn't think I'd ever see Riki this upset...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I didn't think I'd ever see Riki this upset...❞

MESSAGE.JP: わ、取り乱してるのか…。落ち着け、落ち着け…。
MESSAGE.EN: Uwah, I've lost my cool...? I've got to calm down, calm down...
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwah, I've lost my cool...? I've got to calm down, calm down...

MESSAGE.JP: ーダー然とあれ。
MESSAGE.EN: You are the leader, act the part.
MESSAGE.Translation: You are the leader, act the part.

MESSAGE.JP: うして冷静を装いつつ考えろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Pretend to be cool and keep thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pretend to be cool and keep thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: うしてふたりは野球を推すんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: Why do these two both want me to do baseball?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why do these two both want me to do baseball?

MESSAGE.JP: に根拠がないのは明白だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's obvious that Rin has no particular reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's obvious that Rin has no particular reason.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こわっ、こいつにらみつけてる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Scary! He's glaring at me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Scary! He's glaring at me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなところで嘘がつけるような性格じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: She isn't the kind of person to lie in a situation like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: She isn't the kind of person to lie in a situation like this.

MESSAGE.JP: も、真人は…。
MESSAGE.EN: But as for Masato...
MESSAGE.Translation: But as for Masato...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「今度はオレかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now he's looking at me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now he's looking at me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っているはずだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure he knows something...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure he knows something...

MESSAGE.JP: の真人が、鈴の根拠のない勘だけの提案に便乗した。
MESSAGE.EN: And he gave his consent to her baseless, intuitive suggestion.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he gave his consent to her baseless, intuitive suggestion.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は根拠を知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He must know the reason for the choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He must know the reason for the choice.

MESSAGE.JP: もそもその根拠とは？
MESSAGE.EN: What can the reason be in the first place?
MESSAGE.Translation: What can the reason be in the first place?

MESSAGE.JP: た混乱しそうになる。
MESSAGE.EN: I almost got lost in confusion again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I almost got lost in confusion again.

MESSAGE.JP: 計なことまで考えるな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should stop thinking about unnecessary things...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should stop thinking about unnecessary things...

MESSAGE.JP: は真人の言葉だけを信じてみればいい…はずだ（本人はヘンな顔したままだけど）。
MESSAGE.EN: All I need to do right now is have faith in him... (and ignore the funny look he still has on his face).
MESSAGE.Translation: All I need to do right now is have faith in him... (and ignore the funny look he still has on his face).

MESSAGE.JP: 決めた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I've decided.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I've decided.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかった…そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right... let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right... let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、果たして、その勝負を受けてくれるのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wondered if Kengo would ever accept our challenge.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wondered if Kengo would ever accept our challenge.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、時間がないんだよ…もう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But there's no time left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But there's no time left...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「時間ならある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There is time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There is time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: くらだってある。
MESSAGE.EN: There is plenty of time.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is plenty of time.

MESSAGE.JP: れまでも繰り返してきたんだ、俺たちは。
MESSAGE.EN: We've been repeating over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: We've been repeating over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ないよ…明日の夜には、鈴はまた連れていかれるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there isn't... They'll take her back tomorrow evening...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there isn't... They'll take her back tomorrow evening...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それまでしかないんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We only have until then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We only have until then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もし次までに僕が強くなっていたとしても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if I become stronger before she next comes back here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if I become stronger before she next comes back here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一週間後の鈴はどうなってるんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What will happen to her in one more week?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What will happen to her in one more week?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そのさらに一週間後は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And in another week after that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And in another week after that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もう鈴は、鈴じゃなくなってるかもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She might no longer be herself by then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She might no longer be herself by then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうしてまで作った時間の中でだって、僕は何も変われないかもしれないのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And even then, there's no guarantee I will change...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And even then, there's no guarantee I will change...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何も変われない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No guarantee you will change...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No guarantee you will change...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…だったら道はひとつしか残らないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Then there's only one way left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Then there's only one way left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なに？　何が残るの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? What way?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? What way?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「恭介と戦う道だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Fight with Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Fight with Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹…共に倒そう、恭介を。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki... I want to bring him down with you.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki... I want to bring him down with you.

MESSAGE.JP: うすれば、リトルバスターズは永遠のものになる。
MESSAGE.EN: And if we win, the Little Busters will be eternal.
MESSAGE.Translation: And if we win, the Little Busters will be eternal.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「大丈夫だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえはひとりじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're not alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're not alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえには、俺がいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll be there for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll be there for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「こいつは…穏やかじゃないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's with the hostility?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's with the hostility?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ふたりがかりか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Two on one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Two on one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の顔を見て気づいたのだろう。すでに恭介は事態を察している。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have already understood from my face what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have already understood from my face what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そちらも好きに誰でも連れてくるがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can bring whoever you want.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can bring whoever you want.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ただ、理樹のパートナーは俺だ。それは譲らない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But I will be Riki's partner. This is decided.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But I will be Riki's partner. This is decided.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「その手でか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝With that hand of yours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝With that hand of yours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こんなものは飾りだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's a mere decoration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's a mere decoration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なる真似事だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is just a sham.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is just a sham.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ふ…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hmph... Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hmph... Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「勝負は何で決する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How do we decide the winner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How do we decide the winner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんでも受けてたとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's up to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's up to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ…どうするかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay... then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay... then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「リトルバスターズは今や野球チームだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The Little Busters has become a baseball team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The Little Busters has become a baseball team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…またマウンドに立つとすっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...How about we settle it on the field?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...How about we settle it on the field?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「味方の投げるボール、それを先に三本、柵越えさせたほうの勝ちだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Your partner pitches the ball, and whoever hits the ball beyond the fence three times first wins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Your partner pitches the ball, and whoever hits the ball beyond the fence three times first wins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「いいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「で…そっちの相方は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well... who's your partner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well... who's your partner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「わりぃーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The distance was good enough. You'll get it right next time.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Looks like the only choice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、俺が打たないと、この勝負に負ける。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Believe in me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 要最低限の緊張感を帯びた表情。

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「茶番だあぁぁぁーーーーーーーーーっ!!」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝CHEAP TRICKS!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の姿を視界に捉えた。

MESSAGE.Translation: My eyes catch his figure.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「恭介ぇぇーーー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対許さない。

MESSAGE.Translation: That was unforgivable, no matter what.

MESSAGE.Translation: I ram into him and push him down to the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: がおまえの味方で誰がそうでないのか、そんなことはわからないし、どうでもいい！
MESSAGE.EN: I don't even know whether you're my friend or not, and I don't give a damn!
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't even know whether you're my friend or not, and I don't give a damn!

MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke is getting away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: う、俺が引っ張られているんだ。

MESSAGE.Translation: After a moment...

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Called game.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の声がそう宣告した。

MESSAGE.JP: うして奴は、自らのやり方を勝ち取った。

MESSAGE.Translation: He has won the right to proceed with his own solution.

MESSAGE.JP: して、訪れた結末は…

MESSAGE.Translation: And what that end brought us was...

MESSAGE.Translation: ...an ending terrible beyond my imagination.
