MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、そのスカした笑い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell was that smug smirk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell was that smug smirk...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめぇ、やっぱわざとかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You asshole, I knew you did it on purpose!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You asshole, I knew you did it on purpose!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちくしょう…ただじゃおかねぇぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit... You're not getting away with this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit... You're not getting away with this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おまえも毎回大変だな、真人。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm amazed that you never tire of doing this, Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm amazed that you never tire of doing this, Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおりゃあああぁぁぁあーーーーっっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoryaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoryaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振りの拳をステップでかわす。
MESSAGE.EN: I step back and dodge his long range blow.
MESSAGE.Translation: I step back and dodge his long range blow.

MESSAGE.JP: きぃぃ！と、後ろの机がひび割れる音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang*, I hear the desk behind me crack.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang*, I hear the desk behind me crack.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒１@「さすがだな、井ノ原…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 1@❝As expected of Inohara...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 1@❝As expected of Inohara...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒２@「部活にも入らず無駄に鍛え上げられた筋肉をここぞとばかりに見せつけてやがる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 2@❝Building his muscles without reason, despite not having joined any clubs, and using this opportunity to show them off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 2@❝Building his muscles without reason, despite not having joined any clubs, and using this opportunity to show them off...❞

MESSAGE.JP: られた喧嘩は買おう。こいつに限ってはな。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as it's Masato, I won't hold back.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as it's Masato, I won't hold back.

MESSAGE.JP: 刀を取り出し、構える。
MESSAGE.EN: I flourish my shinai.
MESSAGE.Translation: I flourish my shinai.

MESSAGE.JP: 腹を狙う。
MESSAGE.EN: And strike him on the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: And strike him on the side.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおぉ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whoa!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whoa!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人がその巨体を崩す。
MESSAGE.EN: He is forced to his knees.
MESSAGE.Translation: He is forced to his knees.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子Ａ@「いきなり劣勢だぞ、どうした、真人ーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy A@❝C'mon, Masato, that can't be all you've got!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy A@❝C'mon, Masato, that can't be all you've got!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うっせぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: み込んで、連打。
MESSAGE.EN: I step in and strike him repeatedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I step in and strike him repeatedly.

MESSAGE.JP: 撃の隙など与えるものか。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not going to give him any chance to fight back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not going to give him any chance to fight back.

MESSAGE.JP: 赦なく叩き続けてやる。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm just going to keep hitting him without mercy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm just going to keep hitting him without mercy.

MESSAGE.JP: い知れば、おまえも楽になれるんじゃないのか？　と。
MESSAGE.EN: If he learns a lesson here, maybe he'll be able to get free as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: If he learns a lesson here, maybe he'll be able to get free as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「そこまでっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝That's enough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝That's enough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: きぃっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bang*!

MESSAGE.JP: 人とはまったく違う細い体を打ってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: My slash struck someone much slimmer and smaller than Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: My slash struck someone much slimmer and smaller than Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そこまで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's enough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's enough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹が悲痛な顔でそう繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki repeats with a pained look.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki repeats with a pained look.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「勝負はついてるよ…謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The fight is over... Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The fight is over... Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さか、こいつが体を張ってまで止めに入るとは思いもしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I never even considered the possibility of him venturing in to stop the two of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I never even considered the possibility of him venturing in to stop the two of us.

MESSAGE.JP: の一撃だってそうとう堪えたはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The attack I just gave him must have really hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: The attack I just gave him must have really hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: のにまだ真人を庇ったままでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that, he's still shielding Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that, he's still shielding Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなこたねぇよ…とめんなよ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, it's not... Don't interrupt us, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, it's not... Don't interrupt us, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「反撃の機を窺ってただけだ、邪魔すんじゃねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I was just biding my time. Get outta my way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I was just biding my time. Get outta my way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が理樹を押しのけ、再び俺の前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato pushes Riki aside and stands in front of me again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato pushes Riki aside and stands in front of me again.

MESSAGE.JP: 次馬たちから喝采があがる。
MESSAGE.EN: The onlookers give him a merry cheer.
MESSAGE.Translation: The onlookers give him a merry cheer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「竹刀を持った謙吾に敵うはずないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't beat Kengo when he's using his shinai!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't beat Kengo when he's using his shinai!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐまた理樹が止めに入る。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki quickly gets back between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki quickly gets back between us.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなこたねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yes, I can...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yes, I can...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだ、ルールを作ろうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh yeah, why don't we make some rules?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh yeah, why don't we make some rules?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に俺は目を細めた。
MESSAGE.EN: His suggestion makes me narrow my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: His suggestion makes me narrow my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 人を見ると、小さく頷いていた。言わせておけ、ということだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: As I glance at Masato, he gives a slight nod, telling me that we should let him go on.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I glance at Masato, he gives a slight nod, telling me that we should let him go on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「素手だと、真人が強すぎる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In bare-handed fighting, Masato's too strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In bare-handed fighting, Masato's too strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「竹刀を持たせると、逆に謙吾が強すぎる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Conversely, Kengo becomes too strong when he uses his shinai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Conversely, Kengo becomes too strong when he uses his shinai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は野次馬のほうに顔を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: He turns to face the onlookers.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turns to face the onlookers.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんながなんでもいい、武器になりそうなものを適当に投げ入れてほしいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You over there, throw in whatever you think would work as a weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You over there, throw in whatever you think would work as a weapon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはくだらないものほどいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The more worthless, the better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The more worthless, the better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: び、こちらに向き直る。
MESSAGE.EN: Then he turns back toward me and Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then he turns back toward me and Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その中からつかみ取ったもの、それを武器に戦う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whatever you can grab will be your weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whatever you can grab will be your weapon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「と、しよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And those are the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And those are the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…なんで、てめぇがルールなんて作るんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...What gives you the right to set some retarded rules?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...What gives you the right to set some retarded rules?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が先に答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato reacts first.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato reacts first.

MESSAGE.JP: るほど、これまで通りだな。
MESSAGE.EN: I see, continuing as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see, continuing as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: まえはイレギュラーな言動はしない。
MESSAGE.EN: He doesn't do or say anything irregular.
MESSAGE.Translation: He doesn't do or say anything irregular.

MESSAGE.JP: ういうルールだったな。
MESSAGE.EN: That's the rule.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's the rule.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「同意だな。これは俺と真人、ふたりの戦いだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I won't accept them either. This is a fight between Masato and I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I won't accept them either. This is a fight between Masato and I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も続けて冷たく言い放つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Following his lead, I coldly respond to Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: Following his lead, I coldly respond to Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: も知らなくても、俺はそう返していただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if I hadn't known anything, I'm sure I would have said the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if I hadn't known anything, I'm sure I would have said the same.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は聞き入れられなかったショックからか、呆然としている。
MESSAGE.EN: Stunned into silence by our denials, he just stands there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Stunned into silence by our denials, he just stands there.

MESSAGE.JP: がて…
MESSAGE.EN: After a moment...
MESSAGE.Translation: After a moment...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いにその名を叫んだ。悲痛な声で。
MESSAGE.EN: In a painful voice, he finally lets that name out of his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: In a painful voice, he finally lets that name out of his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…恭介は!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Where's Kyousuke!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Where's Kyousuke!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うだ、結局そうしてすがるしかないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, relying on Kyousuke is the only choice for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, relying on Kyousuke is the only choice for him.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「え、あー、さっきまであそこに寝てたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Eh, oh, I saw him sleeping over there until a few minutes ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Eh, oh, I saw him sleeping over there until a few minutes ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さす先は野次馬の生徒でひしめき合っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There are a bunch of onlookers in the direction of his finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: There are a bunch of onlookers in the direction of his finger.

MESSAGE.JP: んなところに寝ていられるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: He can't still be sleeping in a place like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: He can't still be sleeping in a place like that.

MESSAGE.JP: でに姿を消しているだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have already left.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have already left.

MESSAGE.JP: 次馬たちを掻き分け、理樹は、迷子になった子供のように恭介の名を叫びながら遠ざかっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Pushing through the onlookers, Riki is calling Kyousuke like a lost child looking for his parents.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pushing through the onlookers, Riki is calling Kyousuke like a lost child looking for his parents.

MESSAGE.JP: び、俺と真人の戦いが始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The fight between me and Masato resumes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The fight between me and Masato resumes.

MESSAGE.JP: 発か打たせた後、その倍の数を返してやった。
MESSAGE.EN: I first let him give me a couple punches, and then pay them back double.
MESSAGE.Translation: I first let him give me a couple punches, and then pay them back double.

MESSAGE.JP: 者を称える歓声の中、俺はひとり、食堂を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Hearing the people cheering my triumph, I leave the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hearing the people cheering my triumph, I leave the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: つ当たりのようになってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd taken my frustration out on him...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd taken my frustration out on him...

MESSAGE.JP: まん、真人…。
MESSAGE.EN: Sorry, Masato...
MESSAGE.Translation: Sorry, Masato...

MESSAGE.JP: の代わり、俺のほうもかなり打たれた。
MESSAGE.EN: In exchange, I've gotten fairly roughed up also.
MESSAGE.Translation: In exchange, I've gotten fairly roughed up also.

MESSAGE.JP: が痛む…。
MESSAGE.EN: My arm aches...
MESSAGE.Translation: My arm aches...

MESSAGE.JP: かし…痛むという感覚はどこからきているのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: But... where is this pain coming from?
MESSAGE.Translation: But... where is this pain coming from?

MESSAGE.JP: っと痛い、という経験からきてるのだろうな…。
MESSAGE.EN: It must be from an experience of pain...
MESSAGE.Translation: It must be from an experience of pain...

MESSAGE.JP: 果なものだ。こんな世界でも痛みを感じ続けるなんて。
MESSAGE.EN: How very ironic. Even in this world, I'm still feeling pain.
MESSAGE.Translation: How very ironic. Even in this world, I'm still feeling pain.

MESSAGE.JP: うか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait a second...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait a second...

MESSAGE.JP: こではたと思いつく。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment, I realize something.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment, I realize something.

MESSAGE.JP: あいつの計画は失敗に終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...His plan ended in failure.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...His plan ended in failure.

MESSAGE.JP: ら、もう好きにしてもいいんじゃないのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Then, I'm free to do whatever I want, aren't I?
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, I'm free to do whatever I want, aren't I?

MESSAGE.JP: の部屋をノックする。
MESSAGE.EN: I knock on the door of his dorm room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knock on the door of his dorm room.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ、ルームメイトがでてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: His roommate immediately gets the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: His roommate immediately gets the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「あ、宮沢くん、いいとこにきてくれた。棗の奴がさ、電気もつけさせてくれなくてさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Ah, Miyazawa-kun, perfect timing. Natsume won't even let me switch on the light...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Ah, Miyazawa-kun, perfect timing. Natsume won't even let me switch on the light...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「就職活動ももうしないって…漫画の世界に逃避しちゃってさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝He's quit looking for jobs... and is just reading manga...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝He's quit looking for jobs... and is just reading manga...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「あんな中で漫画読んでても目が悪くなるだろうし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝I'm sure his eyes are gonna go bad in this dark room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝I'm sure his eyes are gonna go bad in this dark room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「なんとか言い聞かせてくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Can you talk to him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Can you talk to him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「ぼく、隣の部屋に避難してるから、よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝I'll be in the next room. Thanks!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝I'll be in the next room. Thanks!❞

MESSAGE.JP: をぽんと叩いて、その男子生徒は隣の部屋に逃げるように入っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He taps me once on the shoulder and slips into the next room as if fleeing.
MESSAGE.Translation: He taps me once on the shoulder and slips into the next room as if fleeing.

MESSAGE.JP: のは誰だ？　誰が心配している？
MESSAGE.EN: Who was that? Who's worried about Kyousuke?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who was that? Who's worried about Kyousuke?

MESSAGE.JP: あいい。追究はしないでおこう。
MESSAGE.EN: Whatever. I have something more important to do than pry further.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whatever. I have something more important to do than pry further.

MESSAGE.JP: け放たれたままのドア。
MESSAGE.EN: The door is left open.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door is left open.

MESSAGE.JP: の先に見えるのは暗闇だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can only see darkness inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can only see darkness inside.

MESSAGE.JP: に入り、ドアを閉じる。
MESSAGE.EN: I enter the room and close the door behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I enter the room and close the door behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: 初はどんな光も感じられなかったが、目が慣れてくると月明かりで机やベッドなど、全景が浮かび上がってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Although at first I can see nothing, my eyes adapt to dark quickly and soon I can see a full view of the room in the moonlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although at first I can see nothing, my eyes adapt to dark quickly and soon I can see a full view of the room in the moonlight.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「…誰かいるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝...Is someone there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝...Is someone there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ッドの膨らみから声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: A voice comes out of the bulge on the bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: A voice comes out of the bulge on the bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「わかっているだろう、俺だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You know that. It's me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You know that. It's me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「謙吾か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は椅子を借りて、腰掛ける。ぎいっと音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I borrow the chair beside his desk and sit down. It creaks under me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I borrow the chair beside his desk and sit down. It creaks under me.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なんの用だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you want...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you want...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「困ってたぞ、ルームメイト」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Your roommate, he's troubled by you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Your roommate, he's troubled by you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺が困らせてるわけじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I haven't gotten him in trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I haven't gotten him in trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「まあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Be that as it may.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Be that as it may.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「でも、誰かがなんとかしてあげてくれ、と言っている。その違いはない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There's somebody telling me to help you out regardless. I have no doubt about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There's somebody telling me to help you out regardless. I have no doubt about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「だが、おまえがこうなってしまったのは自業自得だ、と俺は思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Nonetheless, I believe you are the one that's made yourself like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Nonetheless, I believe you are the one that's made yourself like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだん声が小さくなっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: His voice is growing fainter as we speak.
MESSAGE.Translation: His voice is growing fainter as we speak.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ここでおまえに怒りをぶつけてもいいところだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can't blame me even if I go all out on you here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can't blame me even if I go all out on you here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうだな…と小さな声。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Yeah... he whispers.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Yeah... he whispers.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹は…怒りのぶつけどころすらわからないんだ、可哀想に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki... He doesn't even know who or what he should be angry at. Poor him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki... He doesn't even know who or what he should be angry at. Poor him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「真人は相変わらず馬鹿を繰り返している」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Masato still does his usual silly act.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Masato still does his usual silly act.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえと鈴だけが変わってしまった…あの日以来」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Only you and Rin have changed... since that day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Only you and Rin have changed... since that day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後悔しているからだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's because of regret, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's because of regret, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: He doesn't reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: He doesn't reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…まあいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後は俺の好きにさせてもらうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm going to do as I like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm going to do as I like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の一言だけを言いにきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I just came over here to tell him that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just came over here to tell him that.

MESSAGE.JP: れだけだ。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With that arm... you can't compete...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's true...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just looking at him wears me out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁ」

MESSAGE.Translation: Riki gets surprised by Masato's sudden emergence to his side, so drenched in sweat that steam is rising off him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、てっきりやめどきぐらい自分でわかる大人だろうと…」

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んなわけあるかよっ！」

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm pretty sure that even if I asked you to come up with something fun to do, your answer would just be muscle training...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm pretty sure that even if I asked you to come up with something fun to do, your answer would just be muscle training...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、おまえらも筋トレするんじゃなかったのか？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait a sec, isn't that what you guys are planning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うよ。謙吾も暇になったし、みんなでなんか楽しいことできないかなって考えてるんだよ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No. Since Kengo's got a lot of time to spare, we're trying to think of something fun to do.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Geez... and here I sorta lost my cool 'cause I thought you guys were going to build your muscles without me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Geez... and here I sorta lost my cool 'cause I thought you guys were going to build your muscles without me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人も一緒にできるぐらいまでレベルを落とすとなると…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now I have to think up something that Masato can do together with us as well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now I have to think up something that Masato can do together with us as well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「トランプとか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Playing cards?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Playing cards?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …またそんなしょうもないものを…。
MESSAGE.EN: Argh... Not another ordinary suggestion...
MESSAGE.Translation: Argh... Not another ordinary suggestion...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「う…なんか頭が痛い…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uu... My head's killing me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uu... My head's killing me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「トランプで!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝From cards!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝From cards!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぬり絵…とか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, then what... coloring pictures?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, then what... coloring pictures?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ…収まってきた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh... I'm getting better...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh... I'm getting better...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと待て。真人、おまえのせいでどんどんつまらないものになっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Hold on a second, Masato. You're making Riki's suggestions even more trivial.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hold on a second, Masato. You're making Riki's suggestions even more trivial.

MESSAGE.JP: いが、攻撃させてもらう。
MESSAGE.EN: Sorry, but I'll go on the offense.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sorry, but I'll go on the offense.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「囲碁」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ぎゃあああぁあああぁぁああーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Gyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Gyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「将棋」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Shogi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Shogi.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dooruuuaaaaaaaaaaaaahhhh!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, you shouldn't bully him. He's also trying to help.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you hadn't mentioned go or shogi, he would have spent the rest of his life happily without ever picturing himself playing those games.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Agreed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「つまりは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝In other words...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝In other words...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「真人を入れるとなると頭を使うものは無理だってことだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝With Masato in the picture, we can't do anything that requires using our heads.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝With Masato in the picture, we can't do anything that requires using our heads.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の手をぐっと閉じた後、そうまとめる。
MESSAGE.EN: I close my hand again as I make that conclusion.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that's right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that's right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「仕方ない。運動でもいいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I suppose it can't be helped. I'll be fine even if it's a physical game.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I suppose it can't be helped. I'll be fine even if it's a physical game.❞

MESSAGE.EN: All right, that should be enough to put him back on track.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, that should be enough to put him back on track.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもその腕じゃ無理でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you've got an injured arm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you've got an injured arm.❞

MESSAGE.EN: I point at my arm in the sling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I point at my arm in the sling.

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There's no problem as long as I don't use this hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There's no problem as long as I don't use this hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええ…やめときなよ、走ったりしたら揺れて、絶対痛いって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ehh... I doubt it. Running or twisting your body is definitely going to hurt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehh... I doubt it. Running or twisting your body is definitely going to hurt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「問題ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There's no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There's no problem.❞

MESSAGE.EN: I put so much emphasis into my words that Riki can't protest any further.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't blame me if you end up with your arm taking longer to heal then, okay?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That won't happen. I'm not as childish as Masato.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmph... my head may be that of a child, but don't you think my body is definitely more adult?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know you're referring to your muscles, but you'd better not say that in public because some people might take it the wrong way...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, but don't chicken out then...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Thus following his proposition, we decided on a game to find out who can walk furthest on the third floor window railing.

MESSAGE.JP: るほど、これは恭介が考えそうなことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I see. This is certainly something that Kyousuke would come up with.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see. This is certainly something that Kyousuke would come up with.

MESSAGE.JP: のスリル感…
MESSAGE.EN: This thrill and...
MESSAGE.Translation: This thrill and...

MESSAGE.JP: 湧き肉躍る感じ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...excitement I'm feeling right now...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...excitement I'm feeling right now...

MESSAGE.JP: くない。

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never push me over the side, even as a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never push me over the side, even as a joke.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I know. Although this is a game, it's also a real battle.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Did I just say something odd? For a moment I feel there is a cold glint in his eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Did I just say something odd? For a moment I feel there is a cold glint in his eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「でも、自分で落ちるのは自業自得だぜ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But you can't blame anyone else when you fall off on your own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつはすごく自分で落ちそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He's totally going to fall off on his own.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's totally going to fall off on his own.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Considering the sense of balance and concentration required, I think I can tell who's gonna win...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Considering the sense of balance and concentration required, I think I can tell who's gonna win...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえもするんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're participating as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're participating as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかってるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にはクラスメイトたちが野次馬となって張りついている。

MESSAGE.Translation: The other classmates have all gathered by the window to watch us.

MESSAGE.JP: の興味の目がいかに無謀を働くことかを証明している。
MESSAGE.EN: The interest in their eyes proves how wild what we're going to do right now is.

MESSAGE.JP: いだろう…望むところだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Great... that's what I'm talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: Great... that's what I'm talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: 番を決めるじゃんけんをする。
MESSAGE.EN: We play rock-paper-scissors to decide who goes first.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rock, paper, scissors!❞

MESSAGE.EN: Riki and I picked rock, and Masato took paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki and I picked rock, and Masato took paper.

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh... I did it... or rather... what have I done...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh... I did it... or rather... what have I done...?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Suck it up and go.❞

MESSAGE.EN: He jumps across to the railing outside.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よっ…うおっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Here I go... Oh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Here I go... Oh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うわああぁぁぁーーーーーーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhh...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: タート地点から落ちていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He falls right off the starting point.
MESSAGE.Translation: He falls right off the starting point.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「やりやがった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He went and did it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He went and did it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、そういう人だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it was destined to happen...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it was destined to happen...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かしい感じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This gives me such a nostalgic feeling.
MESSAGE.Translation: This gives me such a nostalgic feeling.

MESSAGE.EN: It was just like this, back in those days.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just like this, back in those days.

MESSAGE.JP: 介が、俺に…救いの手を差し伸べてくれた日から。
MESSAGE.EN: Since the day... when Kyousuke held out his hand to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since the day... when Kyousuke held out his hand to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…見てくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'll go see if he's okay down there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'll go see if he's okay down there.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I'm left alone up here.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「よっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Here I go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Here I go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は手すりにのぼると、一気に端から端まで渡ってみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: I step onto the railing and make it from one end to the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: I step onto the railing and make it from one end to the other.

MESSAGE.JP: の晩、遊んだ後、理樹に元気がないことに気づいた。
MESSAGE.EN: That night, after playing some games together, I notice Riki looking depressed.
MESSAGE.Translation: That night, after playing some games together, I notice Riki looking depressed.

MESSAGE.JP: 確には、放課後、三人で遊んだ後からだ。
MESSAGE.EN: To be more accurate, he's been like that ever since we played after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be more accurate, he's been like that ever since we played after school.

MESSAGE.EN: He is feeling nostalgic over those days the five of us spent always together.
MESSAGE.Translation: He is feeling nostalgic over those days the five of us spent always together.

MESSAGE.JP: の気持ちはわかる。

MESSAGE.JP: がそれを壊したのは誰でもない、恭介だ。
MESSAGE.EN: However, it is no one but Kyousuke himself that has screwed up everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, it is no one but Kyousuke himself that has screwed up everything.

MESSAGE.JP: は被害者だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin is a victim.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin is a victim.

MESSAGE.JP: も知らない理樹が、可哀想に思えてならなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I cannot help but feel sorry for Riki, who doesn't know anything at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I cannot help but feel sorry for Riki, who doesn't know anything at all.

MESSAGE.JP: から声をかけてみた。

MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How's... Rin doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How's... Rin doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「変わりないよ、っていうのがいいのか悪いのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing new... I don't know if that's good or bad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing new... I don't know if that's good or bad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「確かに難しい問題だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Indeed. That sure is a hard problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Indeed. That sure is a hard problem.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not only her problem, but ours too.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Hm?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you feel at all lonely without her here with us?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Of course I do.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And Kyousuke too.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And the more people join us, the easier it will be to catch her throws.❞
