MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is a big chance for us to play together again. We can't miss it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is a big chance for us to play together again. We can't miss it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴のためにも、僕らのためにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For Rin's sake, and also for ourselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For Rin's sake, and also for ourselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呼吸置き、それに、と続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a slight pause, he goes on.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a slight pause, he goes on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「友達だろ、僕たち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're friends, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're friends, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 勢を張るように、男らしい口調だった。
MESSAGE.EN: He asks in a manly tone of voice to bolster his bravado.
MESSAGE.Translation: He asks in a manly tone of voice to bolster his bravado.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「うむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れに気圧されるように頷いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Overwhelmed by his countenance, I nod in agreement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Overwhelmed by his countenance, I nod in agreement.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…ああ、そうだな、よし、やろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Yes, we are. Okay, let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Yes, we are. Okay, let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: めて言い直す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recollect myself to give a clear answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recollect myself to give a clear answer.

MESSAGE.JP: うだ。まったく構わない。何も悪いことなんて起こっていないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, it doesn't matter. Nothing bad is going to happen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, it doesn't matter. Nothing bad is going to happen.

MESSAGE.JP: 緒に遊ぶだけだ。何も問題はない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just playing together. There won't be any problems.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just playing together. There won't be any problems.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介も誘わないとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We have to invite Kyousuke too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We have to invite Kyousuke too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これで５人、元通りだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And the five of us will be back together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And the five of us will be back together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「まあ…その、がんばれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well... I wish you luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well... I wish you luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 切れ悪く、そう励ました。
MESSAGE.EN: I give him words of encouragement, though I can't say they come from heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: I give him words of encouragement, though I can't say they come from heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 日の放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: The following day, after school.
MESSAGE.Translation: The following day, after school.

MESSAGE.JP: は離れた場所から、真人と理樹たちが落ち合うのをぼぅっと見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: From afar, I am absent-mindedly watching Riki and Rin talking to Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: From afar, I am absent-mindedly watching Riki and Rin talking to Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、あっちに謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And that's Kengo over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And that's Kengo over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 意に理樹が俺を振り向き、そう紹介した。
MESSAGE.EN: He suddenly turns to face me and introduces me to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: He suddenly turns to face me and introduces me to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…元気だったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Have you been doing well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Have you been doing well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: に向けて離れたまま訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I ask her without approaching.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ask her without approaching.

MESSAGE.JP: は曖昧に首を捻った。
MESSAGE.EN: She gives an evasive nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gives an evasive nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 拶は終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: The greetings are done.
MESSAGE.Translation: The greetings are done.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「４人だと中庭は狭いね、グラウンドにいこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The courtyard is too narrow for the four of us to play. Let's move over to the sports field.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The courtyard is too narrow for the four of us to play. Let's move over to the sports field.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「グローブは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What about gloves?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What about gloves?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「廃部同然の野球部の部室に寄って借りていくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll get them from the baseball club room on the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll get them from the baseball club room on the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「うおりゃああぁーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Uoryaaaahhh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Uoryaaaahhh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直の校舎の壁を駆け上がり、宙でキャッチ。
MESSAGE.EN: I run up the building wall and catch the ball mid-air.
MESSAGE.Translation: I run up the building wall and catch the ball mid-air.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すごい！　スーパープレイだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Holy smokes! That's a super play!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Holy smokes! That's a super play!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 地すると同時、グローブを脇に挟み、鈴へ返球。
MESSAGE.EN: While I land on the ground, I hold my glove under my arm and throw the ball back to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I land on the ground, I hold my glove under my arm and throw the ball back to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: んだかんだで、本気になってしまってるじゃないか、俺は…。
MESSAGE.EN: Look at me, in the end I'm totally into this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Look at me, in the end I'm totally into this...

MESSAGE.JP: して、日が暮れ終わる頃には、鈴は…
MESSAGE.EN: And when the sun has nearly set...
MESSAGE.Translation: And when the sun has nearly set...

MESSAGE.JP: の傷を負ってしまった鈴は、俺たちに心を許し始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, who was hurt so deeply, begins opening up to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, who was hurt so deeply, begins opening up to us.

MESSAGE.JP: くなっていくんだな…本当に。
MESSAGE.EN: She is actually getting better... There's no doubt about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She is actually getting better... There's no doubt about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 分の言葉だったのに、半ば呆れるように実感していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I'm the one saying it, it astonishes me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I'm the one saying it, it astonishes me.

MESSAGE.JP: して。
MESSAGE.EN: And...
MESSAGE.Translation: And...

MESSAGE.JP: れを遂げたのは、理樹の行動力だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It's Riki's unrelenting activity that has made it happen.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's Riki's unrelenting activity that has made it happen.

MESSAGE.JP: う悟った時、俺は嫌な予感の正体に気付いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Realizing that, I also find out what's been bothering me so.
MESSAGE.Translation: Realizing that, I also find out what's been bothering me so.

MESSAGE.JP: いつと被って見えるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki looks just like him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki looks just like him.

MESSAGE.JP: 散させるために、リトルバスターズを結成し、野球を始めたあいつと。
MESSAGE.EN: That man who turned the Little Busters into a baseball team in order to dissolve it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That man who turned the Little Busters into a baseball team in order to dissolve it.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝会った理樹は、寝起きにも関わらず興奮した様子でいた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I see Riki the next morning, he seems full of excitement despite having just woken up.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I see Riki the next morning, he seems full of excitement despite having just woken up.

MESSAGE.JP: くに眠ってもいないんじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: He looks like he's had little sleep last night.
MESSAGE.Translation: He looks like he's had little sleep last night.

MESSAGE.JP: た何かを思いついたに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I feel sure he has something new on his mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I feel sure he has something new on his mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 騒ぎがした。
MESSAGE.EN: Uneasiness washes over me again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Uneasiness washes over me again.

MESSAGE.JP: れはきっと…よくないことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Because... it must be something bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because... it must be something bad.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「先に中庭いっててくれる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Go to the courtyard without me. I'll catch you guys soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Go to the courtyard without me. I'll catch you guys soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 課後になるやいなや、俺たちを集めて理樹はそう告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: After school, he quickly gathers us up and then tells us that.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school, he quickly gathers us up and then tells us that.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、もしかしたらグラウンド使えるんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe we can use the sports field.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe we can use the sports field.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「空いてたら、グラウンドで待ってて。僕も覗いてみるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it's free, wait for me there. I'll look there first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it's free, wait for me there. I'll look there first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の両肩をぽんと叩いてから、理樹は教室を出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He gives Rin a tap on both shoulders and leaves the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: He gives Rin a tap on both shoulders and leaves the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「先にいってろ。鈴を頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Go without me. You take Rin there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Go without me. You take Rin there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレもいくぜっ、鈴を頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll come too. You take care of her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll come too. You take care of her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「誰に頼めるんだっ、おまえは残れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Who are you telling to take care of her? That's your job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Who are you telling to take care of her? That's your job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の顔をわっしと掴み、押し戻してやった。
MESSAGE.EN: I push his face back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I push his face back.

MESSAGE.JP: して、理樹の後を追った。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I follow after Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I follow after Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は野球部の部室にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I find him in the baseball clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I find him in the baseball clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: かを探しにきたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He appears to be looking for something.
MESSAGE.Translation: He appears to be looking for something.

MESSAGE.JP: 単に見つかったようで、それを手に満足げでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: He finds what he's looking for easily enough. He looks happy holding the thing in his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: He finds what he's looking for easily enough. He looks happy holding the thing in his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹…それは意図的なのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Riki... are you doing this on purpose?
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki... are you doing this on purpose?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それでどうするつもりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I speak up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I speak up.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は人の気配にも気付いていなかったらしく、飛び上がるようにして振り向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Since he hadn't noticed me at all, he turns around skittishly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since he hadn't noticed me at all, he turns around skittishly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、４人いるんだしさ、キャッチボールじゃなくて、２対２にして試合っぽくしたほうが楽しいかなって思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well you know, now that there are four of us, I think it would be more fun if we form two teams and play a match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well you know, now that there are four of us, I think it would be more fun if we form two teams and play a match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは何をしようとしているんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、野球…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like I said, baseball...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like I said, baseball...❞

MESSAGE.JP: りたいのは、その先にある目的だ。
MESSAGE.EN: What I want to know is what lies ahead of that.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I want to know is what lies ahead of that.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんのために」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝For what reason?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝For what reason?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんなで野球したら楽しいでしょ？　そんなことに理由なんている？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you think it would be fun to play baseball together? What more is there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you think it would be fun to play baseball together? What more is there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「楽しいからか。だったら他の遊びでもいいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Because it'd be fun, huh? Then can't we do whatever else that looks fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Because it'd be fun, huh? Then can't we do whatever else that looks fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも鈴が野球をやりたがってるんだよ。他の遊びになんてまったく興味を示さなかったあの日からの鈴が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But Rin wants to do this. You know she hasn't been interested in anything before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But Rin wants to do this. You know she hasn't been interested in anything before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の記憶からたぐり寄せたのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have reached this point following the trail of her memories...
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have reached this point following the trail of her memories...

MESSAGE.JP: まわしい記憶だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Those horrible ones...
MESSAGE.Translation: Those horrible ones...

MESSAGE.JP: も、その世界の最後の記憶こそ、鈴の精神を引き裂くものだったのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Those last memories from that world are exactly what tore her mind apart...
MESSAGE.Translation: Those last memories from that world are exactly what tore her mind apart...

MESSAGE.JP: 肉なものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's too ironic.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's too ironic.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうだな…今のおまえの目的はよくわかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's right... I understand your purpose very well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's right... I understand your purpose very well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なら、俺はここで降りる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So I'm out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So I'm out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとりでも、あの時とは違う行動をとる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it's only me, I should do something different from before.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it's only me, I should do something different from before.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おりる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れが今の俺にできる唯一の抵抗だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's the only manner of resistance that I can offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's the only manner of resistance that I can offer.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後は三人でやってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The rest is between you three.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The rest is between you three.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　ちょっと待ってよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait a second!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait a second!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっと４人揃ったのにっ、これからだと思ってたのに…わけがわからないよ、どうして!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The four of us are finally back together, and I thought... I, I just don't get you. Why!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The four of us are finally back together, and I thought... I, I just don't get you. Why!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえには理解できない問題だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You wouldn't be able to understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You wouldn't be able to understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「怪我してから、率先して遊んできたのに、どうして今更降りるなんて言い出すのさ？　鈴のことが嫌いなの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've been so eager to play ever since you got injured. Why would you leave us now? Do you hate Rin!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've been so eager to play ever since you got injured. Why would you leave us now? Do you hate Rin!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんなわけないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、理由を教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then tell me why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then tell me why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「だから、言ったとしてもおまえには理解できない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I told you, even if I were to explain, you wouldn't be able to understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I told you, even if I were to explain, you wouldn't be able to understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいから教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just tell me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just tell me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は…顔の半分を手で覆う。忌々しい記憶を思い出して。
MESSAGE.EN: I... cover half of my face with my hand, recalling those black memories.
MESSAGE.Translation: I... cover half of my face with my hand, recalling those black memories.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえの行動がかぶるんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何が？　誰と？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Same thing? As who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Same thing? As who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「今のおまえの行動が…あいつと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing... he did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing... he did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あいつ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…恭介？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の通りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right.

MESSAGE.JP: えはしなかったが、理樹には確信が持てただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't spell it out for him, but said enough for him to figure it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't spell it out for him, but said enough for him to figure it out.

MESSAGE.JP: ら十分だろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Then that's enough...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then that's enough...

MESSAGE.JP: はその場をようやく後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally leave.

MESSAGE.JP: み明けに、騒ぎは起きた。
MESSAGE.EN: After the weekend, there is new trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the weekend, there is new trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: の真人が、校内を暴れ回っているとの話だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato is rampaging through the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato is rampaging through the school.

MESSAGE.JP: んだ？
MESSAGE.EN: What is it?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is it?

MESSAGE.JP: 体何が始まった？
MESSAGE.EN: Just what is happening?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just what is happening?

MESSAGE.JP: んな話は聞いていない。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody told me anything about this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody told me anything about this.

MESSAGE.JP: もそも真人は、日常を守る側の人間だったはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He's supposed to protect the peace of our everyday lives.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's supposed to protect the peace of our everyday lives.

MESSAGE.JP: れが自ら壊しにかかるとは不可解すぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just too weird that he himself is breaking it.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just too weird that he himself is breaking it.

MESSAGE.JP: 人自身の判断じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: That cannot be his own decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: That cannot be his own decision.

MESSAGE.JP: いつは完璧にそれをこれまで全うしてきたはずだ。何遍も何遍も。
MESSAGE.EN: He's been playing his role perfectly. Over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's been playing his role perfectly. Over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: こには誰かの思惑が働いているとしか考えられない。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, this unusual behavior of his must, without mistake, be caused by the will of another.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, this unusual behavior of his must, without mistake, be caused by the will of another.

MESSAGE.JP: としたら、あいつしかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: In that case, there's only one target for my suspicion.
MESSAGE.Translation: In that case, there's only one target for my suspicion.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…何を始めた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What are you doing this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What are you doing this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 間なのにカーテンを閉めきって暗い部屋、その隅にうずくまる影に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: In spite of it still being light out, the room is dark with its curtains closed.
MESSAGE.Translation: In spite of it still being light out, the room is dark with its curtains closed.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「…謙吾か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝...Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝...Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れた声が返ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A husky voice answers me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A husky voice answers me.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何を始めた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you doing this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you doing this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 問を繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: I repeat my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I repeat my question.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…俺は何も始めていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I'm not doing anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I'm not doing anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「始めたのは、理樹さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹が…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹にその自覚はないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He can't be doing anything on purpose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He can't be doing anything on purpose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…あるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Yes, he is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Yes, he is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「違う、おまえに動かされているにすぎない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No. He's just being manipulated by you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No. He's just being manipulated by you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ…どうとでも思えばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well... think whatever you like.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well... think whatever you like.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あいつはもう、それを目指しはじめたんだからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He's already set off toward ❛it❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He's already set off toward ❛it❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえはまた繰り返すつもりなのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Are you going to repeat the same thing again...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Are you going to repeat the same thing again...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: える声で言った。
MESSAGE.EN: My voice is shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: My voice is shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「同じことになるぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There'll be no difference...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There'll be no difference...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「また暗闇に突き落とすぞ…あのふたりを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Those two... will just fall into darkness again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Those two... will just fall into darkness again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今度はそうはならないかもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Maybe not, this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Maybe not, this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あいつは随分と…成長した…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He has grown... a lot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He has grown... a lot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「人はそんな簡単に変われない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝People can't change that easily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝People can't change that easily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「特にあいつらは…弱すぎる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Especially those two... They are much too weak.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Especially those two... They are much too weak.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「まだまだ子供だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝They're still just children...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝They're still just children...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえや俺が見ていてやらないで…どうするんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If we don't look after them... who else will...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If we don't look after them... who else will...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いつまでも子供じゃないさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Children won't stay children forever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Children won't stay children forever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「人は成長する…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝They grow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝They grow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こんな閉ざされた世界でもか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even in this closed world!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even in this closed world!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を荒げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I raise my voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I raise my voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「無理だ、そんなことは不可能だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's impossible, it can't happen!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's impossible, it can't happen!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「恭介、おまえは間違っている！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke, you are wrong!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke, you are wrong!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 弾を続けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I keep accusing him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I keep accusing him.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「やめろ、今すぐ、やめるんだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Quit it! Just quit what you're doing right now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Quit it! Just quit what you're doing right now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…だから俺は何も始めてやしない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Told you, I'm not doing anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Told you, I'm not doing anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「じゃあ、理樹を止めるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then I'll stop Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then I'll stop Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…すきにしろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sure... Do whatever you want...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sure... Do whatever you want...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の部屋を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I leave his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I leave his room.

MESSAGE.JP: かし止めるとは言っても、何をしようとしているかわかっていない状態では何も手出しできない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I've decided to stop Riki, I have no idea what he's trying to achieve, so I can't do anything for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I've decided to stop Riki, I have no idea what he's trying to achieve, so I can't do anything for now.

MESSAGE.JP: 状は様子見か…。
MESSAGE.EN: All I can do at the moment is wait and see...
MESSAGE.Translation: All I can do at the moment is wait and see...

MESSAGE.JP: にかく、理樹の意図を紐解こう。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I think I should at least try to find out Riki's purpose.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I think I should at least try to find out Riki's purpose.

MESSAGE.JP: は暗い廊下の窓から、戦いを見下ろしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm watching something happening down below through a hallway window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm watching something happening down below through a hallway window.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹と真人の一戦だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a fight between Riki and Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a fight between Riki and Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の暴走を今夜、理樹が止めに入ったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki is facing Masato, who's gone berserk, and is trying to stop him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki is facing Masato, who's gone berserk, and is trying to stop him.

MESSAGE.JP: の勇気だって、俺には信じられない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't even believe he had the courage to make that decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't even believe he had the courage to make that decision.

MESSAGE.JP: 当に…理樹は変わったのだろうか…強くなったのだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Has he really... changed? Has he... really become stronger than before?
MESSAGE.Translation: Has he really... changed? Has he... really become stronger than before?

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は作戦を講じてはそれを繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: He's employing one trick after another.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's employing one trick after another.

MESSAGE.JP: もそれを手伝う。
MESSAGE.EN: And Rin is assisting him.
MESSAGE.Translation: And Rin is assisting him.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿はまさしく、棗兄妹の戦いだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What they are doing down there reminds me exactly of how the Natsume siblings used to fight together.
MESSAGE.Translation: What they are doing down there reminds me exactly of how the Natsume siblings used to fight together.

MESSAGE.JP: や、真人の居なかったころの…リトルバスターズだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just like the Little Busters before Masato and me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just like the Little Busters before Masato and me.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の体がついに崩れ落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: And finally, Masato collapses.
MESSAGE.Translation: And finally, Masato collapses.

MESSAGE.JP: 我が目を疑うような風景だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I can't believe my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I can't believe my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹が真人に勝った…。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki has won over Masato...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki has won over Masato...

MESSAGE.JP: 樹…本当におまえは…
MESSAGE.EN: Riki... tell me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki... tell me...

MESSAGE.JP: こに向かっているんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Where are you headed for...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where are you headed for...?

MESSAGE.JP: 食に向かう途中に三人は現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way to the cafeteria, I run into the three of them.
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way to the cafeteria, I run into the three of them.

MESSAGE.JP: いにきたか…。
MESSAGE.EN: They finally came to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: They finally came to me...

MESSAGE.JP: を考えている…。
MESSAGE.EN: What are you guys thinking...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What are you guys thinking...?

MESSAGE.JP: 人揃って、俺の顔を窺うばかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They are all just looking at my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: They are all just looking at my face.

MESSAGE.JP: うするつもりだ…？
MESSAGE.EN: What are you planning...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What are you planning...?

MESSAGE.JP: 迫した時間がすぎる…。
MESSAGE.EN: The more time passes by, the tenser I get...
MESSAGE.Translation: The more time passes by, the tenser I get...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…いたって健康そうなんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...He looks like he's in pretty good shape.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...He looks like he's in pretty good shape.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「血色もいいし、病人の顔ではないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝His complexion seems fine. He doesn't look sick, at least...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝His complexion seems fine. He doesn't look sick, at least...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だが、顔はばかそうだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But his face looks stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But his face looks stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉で一気に脱力した。
MESSAGE.EN: All the tension left my body at once at her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the tension left my body at once at her words.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「喝ーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kaaaaaaaaaaatsu!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kaaaaaaaaaaatsu!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うぉぉっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwoh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwoh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: の気合いの一声で三人を押し戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: I push the three back with a shout.
MESSAGE.Translation: I push the three back with a shout.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なにすんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「耳きーーーーんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My ears are riiiiiinging.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My ears are riiiiiinging.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それはこっちのセリフだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's what I want to say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's what I want to say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「耳きーーーーんがか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Your ears are riiiiiinging too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Your ears are riiiiiinging too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それではない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Guess again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Guess again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんだ、やぶからぼうに人の顔をじろじろと見て、果ては馬鹿そうなツラだと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's with you guys? You suddenly start staring at my face and then say it looks stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's with you guys? You suddenly start staring at my face and then say it looks stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、謙吾が元気か心配してきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We just wanted to make sure you were fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We just wanted to make sure you were fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「元気なものか、怪我をしてるんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Does it look like I'm fine, with this injury?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Does it look like I'm fine, with this injury?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ブスの巻かれた腕を指さして見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I show them my plastered arm and point at it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I show them my plastered arm and point at it.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹がそれを見つめて、両の手のひらを差し出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki holds out both of his hands toward the arm with his eyes fixed on it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki holds out both of his hands toward the arm with his eyes fixed on it.

MESSAGE.JP: んだ…何が始まる…。
MESSAGE.EN: What is it...? What is about to happen...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is it...? What is about to happen...?

MESSAGE.JP: た緊張が走る…。
MESSAGE.EN: Tension clenches my stomach once again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Tension clenches my stomach once again...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうしたんだ、両手かざして？　気功か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What are you doing with your hands? Practicing qigong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What are you doing with your hands? Practicing qigong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気功だと？
MESSAGE.EN: ...What? Qigong?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What? Qigong?

MESSAGE.JP: つそんなものを覚えた…。
MESSAGE.EN: When did he learn that...?
MESSAGE.Translation: When did he learn that...?

MESSAGE.JP: は一体どうなるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: What will it do to me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What will it do to me...?

MESSAGE.JP: 局効果はなかったのか、理樹はそれを諦めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Eventually nothing changes, and he withdraws his hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eventually nothing changes, and he withdraws his hands.

MESSAGE.JP: ぅ…と心の中で安堵の息をつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Phew... I let out a relief sigh in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Phew... I let out a relief sigh in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は一度踵を返した。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki turns around and starts walking away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki turns around and starts walking away.

MESSAGE.JP: が鈴に説得されたのか、また戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Rin persuades him of something, and he comes back toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Rin persuades him of something, and he comes back toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: び俺の前に立ちふさがった。
MESSAGE.EN: And he stands in front of me again.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he stands in front of me again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me ask you something, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me ask you something, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は改まったように俺の目を見つめていた。
MESSAGE.EN: With a completely renewed mindset, he looks me in the eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a completely renewed mindset, he looks me in the eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介はどうして謙吾のお父さんを倒したの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did Kyousuke fight your father for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did Kyousuke fight your father for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだ、その質問は？
MESSAGE.EN: What's with this question?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's with this question?

MESSAGE.JP: こから出てきた？
MESSAGE.EN: Where did it come from?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where did it come from?

MESSAGE.JP: 功の結果か？
MESSAGE.EN: Is this the result of your qigong thing?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is this the result of your qigong thing?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「えらく昔の話を持ち出すな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's quite an old story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's quite an old story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「事情があってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I need to know this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I need to know this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぜそんな過去の話を持ち出す…？
MESSAGE.EN: What do you need to know something that ancient for...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What do you need to know something that ancient for...?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…さあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...I wonder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...I wonder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺にあいつの考えてることがわかるはずないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How should I know what went through his head back then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How should I know what went through his head back then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 蹴したつもりだったが、理樹は引き下がらない。
MESSAGE.EN: I expected him to give up at this, but he isn't backing off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I expected him to give up at this, but he isn't backing off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、その結果、謙吾は恭介たちと遊ぶようになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, you started hanging out with Kyousuke as a result of him defeating your father, correct?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, you started hanging out with Kyousuke as a result of him defeating your father, correct?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どう、そこへ繋がるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How are those two supposed to be related?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How are those two supposed to be related?❞

MESSAGE.JP: を探っている？
MESSAGE.EN: What is it you seek?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is it you seek?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、恭介は何のために戦ったのさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, what did Kyousuke fight for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, what did Kyousuke fight for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹はその質問に固執した。
MESSAGE.EN: He's really persistent about that question.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's really persistent about that question.

MESSAGE.JP: るほど、繋がった。
MESSAGE.EN: I see, I've just figured it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see, I've just figured it out.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹自身が同じことをすれば、俺がまたリトルバスターズに加わると考えているのか。
MESSAGE.EN: He believes that if he does everything that Kyousuke did before, I'll rejoin the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: He believes that if he does everything that Kyousuke did before, I'll rejoin the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹が始めたこと。
MESSAGE.EN: What he has started on...
MESSAGE.Translation: What he has started on...

MESSAGE.JP: れは恭介に代わり、もう一度リトルバスターズの５人を集めること。
MESSAGE.EN: ...is that, instead of Kyousuke, he gathers up the five of us once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...is that, instead of Kyousuke, he gathers up the five of us once again.

MESSAGE.JP: んの儀式だ、それは。
MESSAGE.EN: What kind of ritual is that?
MESSAGE.Translation: What kind of ritual is that?

MESSAGE.JP: ―破滅への儀式だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――Only one that leads you to destruction.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――Only one that leads you to destruction.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹、おまえは頑張った。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki, you've done enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki, you've done enough.

MESSAGE.JP: のおかげで鈴はこうして回復しつつある。
MESSAGE.EN: Thanks to you, Rin's getting better and better.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thanks to you, Rin's getting better and better.

MESSAGE.JP: れをまた失うかもしれないんだぞ、おまえは…。
MESSAGE.EN: You could lose her again...
MESSAGE.Translation: You could lose her again...

MESSAGE.JP: たあんな結末が訪れるかもしれないんだぞ。
MESSAGE.EN: You could experience that ending again.
MESSAGE.Translation: You could experience that ending again.

MESSAGE.JP: なんて加えないほうがいい。
MESSAGE.EN: It's best you do not have me in the team.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's best you do not have me in the team.

MESSAGE.JP: いじゃないか、おまえたち三人で。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as just the three of you are together, there'll be no problem at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as just the three of you are together, there'll be no problem at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 分楽しそうじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: You seem to be having enough fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: You seem to be having enough fun.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「十分楽しそうじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You seem to be having enough fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You seem to be having enough fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のまま口にしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I voice my thoughts aloud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I voice my thoughts aloud.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の様子も、これまで通りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato looks the way he has been.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato looks the way he has been.

MESSAGE.JP: も元気。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin has recovered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin has recovered.

MESSAGE.JP: うことなしだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing to complain about.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing to complain about.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんな目的は捨てろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Just give up a goal like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Just give up a goal like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「これ以上先を目指すな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Stop trying to go beyond this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Stop trying to go beyond this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺はそんな目的のために、おまえの仲間にはなれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Unless you do that, I can't be with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Unless you do that, I can't be with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹が、止まってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: My advice makes him stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: My advice makes him stop.

MESSAGE.JP: 死に次の言葉を考えているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He must be struggling desperately to figure out what to answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must be struggling desperately to figure out what to answer.

MESSAGE.JP: う頑張らなくていい。
MESSAGE.EN: You don't have to run yourself ragged anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: You don't have to run yourself ragged anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: つものおまえでいいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Just be the way you always are.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just be the way you always are.

MESSAGE.JP: の世界に居る限りは…俺が守ってやる。
MESSAGE.EN: As long as you are in this world... I'll protect you.
MESSAGE.Translation: As long as you are in this world... I'll protect you.

MESSAGE.JP: から、三人で遊んでいろ。
MESSAGE.EN: So you should just play with the other two.
MESSAGE.Translation: So you should just play with the other two.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「宮沢せんぱーい、いかないんすかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Miyazawa-senpai, aren't you coming?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Miyazawa-senpai, aren't you coming?❞

MESSAGE.JP: う後輩に、呼ばせた。
MESSAGE.EN: A first-year student calls me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A first-year student calls me.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もういいな。いくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That should be enough. I have to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That should be enough. I have to go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…ご飯まだだったんだね。引き留めて悪かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... You haven't had dinner yet. I'm sorry for keeping you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... You haven't had dinner yet. I'm sorry for keeping you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はもう何も言わず、その場を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Without saying anything else, I leave the place.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without saying anything else, I leave the place.

MESSAGE.JP: 活を終えて寮に帰ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: After club activities, I come back to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: After club activities, I come back to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐさま嫌な予感がした。
MESSAGE.EN: Immediately I get an intuition that something bad is about to befall me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Immediately I get an intuition that something bad is about to befall me.

MESSAGE.JP: れは胸騒ぎのような重いものじゃなくて、妙なことに巻き込まれそうな、そういう軽い感じだが。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet it's not a heavy feeling; only a light suggestion that I might get involved in something strange.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet it's not a heavy feeling; only a light suggestion that I might get involved in something strange.

MESSAGE.JP: ろ、行く先に鈴が待ちかまえてるではないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Look, there's Rin waiting ahead of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Look, there's Rin waiting ahead of me.

MESSAGE.JP: ろ姿だったが、背格好だけでわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Though she's standing with her back to me, I can easily tell that's her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though she's standing with her back to me, I can easily tell that's her.

MESSAGE.JP: かも、きょろきょろと何度も俺の顔を確認している。
MESSAGE.EN: Besides, she's stealing glances at me over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Besides, she's stealing glances at me over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: 対に何かあるに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: Something's definitely going down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something's definitely going down.

MESSAGE.JP: のすぐ後ろまできたとき。
MESSAGE.EN: The moment I'm close to her...
MESSAGE.Translation: The moment I'm close to her...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「か、壁があぁぁぁーーー!!　ローーーレーーーーンス!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh my, the wall's moving!! Lawrence!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh my, the wall's moving!! Lawrence!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱりか！
MESSAGE.EN: I knew it!
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew it!

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何事だ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's happening!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's happening!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ローレンスが！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My Lawrence!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My Lawrence!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ローレンス!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Lawrence!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Lawrence!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴が指さすものを見る。何かよくわからない物体が落ちている。
MESSAGE.EN: I follow her pointed finger to an object lying on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I follow her pointed finger to an object lying on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: かもそれを押し潰そうと壁が迫ってきているではないか。
MESSAGE.EN: The wall is looming over it, almost ready to crush it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wall is looming over it, almost ready to crush it.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「大事なものなのか!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is that something important to you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is that something important to you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nods.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nods.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「わけがわからないが、やむをえまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but it seems that my help is needed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm not sure what's going on, but it seems that my help is needed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体を拾って向こう側に避難しよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should be able to pick that object up and jump across to the other side.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should be able to pick that object up and jump across to the other side.

MESSAGE.JP: は飛び込んでいった。
MESSAGE.EN: I charge in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I charge in.

MESSAGE.JP: 体を拾い上げたところで、壁の進行速度が一気に増した。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I lift the thing up off the floor, the wall speeds up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I lift the thing up off the floor, the wall speeds up.

MESSAGE.JP: っ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Stretch*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Stretch*!

MESSAGE.JP: 腕で、その動きを制した。
MESSAGE.EN: I receive the wall with my left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I receive the wall with my left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: を込めないと、進行は止まらない。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't stop the wall without putting some strength into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't stop the wall without putting some strength into it.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「くっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく耐え忍ぶが、片腕ではいつまで持つかわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can bear it for a while, but I don't know how much longer I can keep on resisting with just one hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can bear it for a while, but I don't know how much longer I can keep on resisting with just one hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「もういいよ、真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝It's enough, Masato!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝It's enough, Masato!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹が部屋から飛び出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki springs out of his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki springs out of his room.

MESSAGE.JP: して、壁の進行がようやく止まった。
MESSAGE.EN: And the wall finally stops moving.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the wall finally stops moving.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ…これからって時に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the heck...? I was getting to the good part.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the heck...? I was getting to the good part.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の向こうから真人の声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I hear Masato's voice over the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hear Masato's voice over the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これ以上やると、謙吾が本当に怪我しちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You have to stop, or else Kengo will really get injured.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You have to stop, or else Kengo will really get injured.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なるほど。そういうことか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Now I get it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Now I get it.

MESSAGE.JP: を使うようになったな。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like you've grown a little shrewder.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like you've grown a little shrewder.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「鈴、ローレンスだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Rin, here, Lawrence.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Rin, here, Lawrence.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず立ち上がり、物体を投げ渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I stand up and throw her the object.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stand up and throw her the object.

MESSAGE.JP: はそれをひょいとよけた。
MESSAGE.EN: She sidesteps to dodge it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sidesteps to dodge it.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こらこら、大事なものなんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hey, it's important to you, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hey, it's important to you, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「悪いが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm sorry, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm sorry, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしに子供などいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't have any children.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't have any children.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「え？　そういう設定だったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Eh? Is that what the thing was supposed to be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Eh? Is that what the thing was supposed to be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んにしろ、罠にはまってしまったわけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Either way, I fell for their trap hook, line, and sinker.
MESSAGE.Translation: Either way, I fell for their trap hook, line, and sinker.

MESSAGE.JP: は理樹を振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turn to face Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turn to face Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どういうことだ、理樹。説明してもらおうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What is this all about, Riki? You must explain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What is this all about, Riki? You must explain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾は僕らに嘘をついていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You lied to us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You lied to us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「折れた腕じゃ、あんな抵抗はできなかったはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You couldn't have resisted the wall like that with an injured arm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You couldn't have resisted the wall like that with an injured arm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…そんなことを暴くために？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...You guys did this just to uncover that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...You guys did this just to uncover that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな茶番を？
MESSAGE.EN: This entire farce?
MESSAGE.Translation: This entire farce?

MESSAGE.JP: 人を見回す。
MESSAGE.EN: I look at each of the three in turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: I look at each of the three in turn.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹ひとりが頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Only Riki gives me a nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only Riki gives me a nod.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは…何をしたいんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What... do you want?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What... do you want?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはこっちの質問だよ、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's my question, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's my question, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな嘘までついて、どうしたかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did you lie about your arm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did you lie about your arm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…わからないのか？　そんな簡単なことも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Don't you know? That should be easy to figure out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Don't you know? That should be easy to figure out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は黙り込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki goes silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki goes silent.

MESSAGE.JP: えを考えているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: He must be thinking about the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must be thinking about the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: がて悟ったような顔つきになり、重く口を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: It doesn't take him long, and soon he opens his mouth heavily again.
MESSAGE.Translation: It doesn't take him long, and soon he opens his mouth heavily again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だったら僕たちだけにでも話してくれればよかったのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You could have told us, at least...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You could have told us, at least...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「言えば、おまえはリトルバスターズをやめてくれるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If I had, would you have disbanded the Little Busters?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If I had, would you have disbanded the Little Busters?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 継ぎ早に質問を返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I quickly hurl another question at him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quickly hurl another question at him.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹がどんな答えに辿りついたのか、それも考えもしないで。
MESSAGE.EN: Without even thinking what kind of answer he's reached.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without even thinking what kind of answer he's reached.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは…矛盾していない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't that... contradictory?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that... contradictory?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺から言わせると、矛盾してるのは、おまえのほうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝From my point of view, you are the one who's doing something contradictory here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝From my point of view, you are the one who's doing something contradictory here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうして…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝How so...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝How so...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「じゃあ、教えてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, I'll tell you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, I'll tell you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえが辿る行き先を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝About the destination you're heading for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝About the destination you're heading for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れで教えるのは二度目だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This is the second time that I tell him.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is the second time that I tell him.

MESSAGE.JP: 度目は手遅れだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Last time, it was too late.
MESSAGE.Translation: Last time, it was too late.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「その先に待つのは…暗闇だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What awaits you there is... darkness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What awaits you there is... darkness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「一筋の光も射さない…暗闇のただ中だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You will be cast right into the heart of the darkness... where not even a ray of light can find its way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You will be cast right into the heart of the darkness... where not even a ray of light can find its way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹の顔から血の気が引く。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki's face is rapidly becoming pale.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki's face is rapidly becoming pale.

MESSAGE.JP: らかに動揺している。
MESSAGE.EN: He's obviously disturbed.
MESSAGE.Translation: He's obviously disturbed.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらく絶句した後、ようやく呟くように訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: After a second of silence, he finally murmurs a question.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a second of silence, he finally murmurs a question.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…何が起きたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなことはおまえは知らなくていい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...You don't have to know that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...You don't have to know that.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「答えてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tell me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tell me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕が向かう先で、何が起きたのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened at the place I'm heading right now...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened at the place I'm heading right now...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: に出して言わないとわからないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Do you really need me to say it out loud?
MESSAGE.Translation: Do you really need me to say it out loud?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんなことは理樹、おまえは知らなくていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki, you don't have to know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki, you don't have to know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「知るべきなのは『今』を守る方法だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What you need to know is how to protect the ❛now.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What you need to know is how to protect the ❛now.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And that is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And that is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「リトルバスターズの結成をここで断念することだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Give up on forming the Little Busters right here, right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Give up on forming the Little Busters right here, right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は言葉を紡ぎ続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I keep throwing words at him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I keep throwing words at him.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もし、そうしてくれるのなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝If you do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝If you do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「俺は一生おまえを守ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I will protect you to the last.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I will protect you to the last.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ここまでよく頑張ったな、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm proud of everything you've done until now, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm proud of everything you've done until now, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後は俺に任せて、おまえは休め」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You can rest now, and leave it all to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You can rest now, and leave it all to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の世界で、俺はおまえと鈴を守り続けよう。
MESSAGE.EN: In this world, I'll protect you and Rin forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: In this world, I'll protect you and Rin forever.

MESSAGE.JP: まえは何も知らないままでいい。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing you have to know.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing you have to know.

MESSAGE.JP: れ以上何も失うものはない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's nothing more you have to lose.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's nothing more you have to lose.

MESSAGE.JP: から、身を委ねろ、理樹。
MESSAGE.EN: So, just rely on me, Riki.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, just rely on me, Riki.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕はやめない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not quitting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not quitting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだ、その目は。
MESSAGE.EN: What is it with your eyes?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is it with your eyes?

MESSAGE.JP: こを見ているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What do they see?
MESSAGE.Translation: What do they see?

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうして…自らそんな場所に向かう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why... do you seek such a place...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why... do you seek such a place...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「悲しいことがあったからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because there was something that made me sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because there was something that made me sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは…そんなもの知らなくていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki... you don't have to know of that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki... you don't have to know of that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、知らなくちゃいけないんだ、僕は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, I need to know it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, I need to know it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、僕はリトルバスターズを…あの日の５人をもう一度集める」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, I'm going to gather the Little Busters... gather the five of us back together once again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, I'm going to gather the Little Busters... gather the five of us back together once again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なら、俺はついていくことはできない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, I cannot follow you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, I cannot follow you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「お別れだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Goodbye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Goodbye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは決別し…
MESSAGE.EN: That is how we parted...
MESSAGE.Translation: That is how we parted...

MESSAGE.JP: うして今に至る。
MESSAGE.EN: And now here I am.
MESSAGE.Translation: And now here I am.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「恭介、でてこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke, show yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Kyousuke, show yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうした…ここにいるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What is it...? I'm here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What is it...? I'm here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹が、野球で勝負を挑んできた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki's challenged me to a game of baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki's challenged me to a game of baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「へぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえとも同じ勝負をした。覚えているか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I did the same thing with you. Remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I did the same thing with you. Remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「あの時、おまえは何をした？　それも覚えているか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And what you did to me at that time. You remember that, too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And what you did to me at that time. You remember that, too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「たしか雨でコールドゲームだったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I believe the game was called due to rain...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I believe the game was called due to rain...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それもおまえの筋書き通りだったわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That was also part of your plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That was also part of your plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは禁じ手を使って、勝った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You broke a taboo to win.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You broke a taboo to win.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…そうだったっけか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah... I guess so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah... I guess so...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Is that everything?❞

MESSAGE.EN: His position is neutral, so he can't let Riki win on purpose.

MESSAGE.EN: Even though Kyousuke broke it to obtain his victory, Masato won't do the same.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then I don't care what I am. Just let me pitch.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry about this, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know this must sound weird... but I'm begging you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: You two... really seem connected together.

MESSAGE.Translation: Even now, somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: ら…
MESSAGE.EN: Then...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then...

MESSAGE.JP: たり一緒に思い知らせてやろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll just teach you guys a lesson.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll just teach you guys a lesson.

MESSAGE.JP: う考えると…最初からそうしていてもよかったと思えるぐらいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Now that things turned out like this... I'm starting to think I should've done that from the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now that things turned out like this... I'm starting to think I should've done that from the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「わかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝All right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝All right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「イレギュラーな事態だが…今回だけは認めよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is a very irregular situation... but I'll accept it only this once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is a very irregular situation... but I'll accept it only this once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よかった…感謝するよ、ありがとう、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank god... I really appreciate it, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank god... I really appreciate it, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ほら、鈴、ボール」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here, Rin, ball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here, Rin, ball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いつもみたいに投げればいいよ。キャッチャーの真人に向けて。謙吾に投げたらダメだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Throw just like you normally do. But aim at Masato, not Kengo, all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Throw just like you normally do. But aim at Masato, not Kengo, all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえはエースをばかにしてるのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you belittling the ace?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you belittling the ace?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 供の遊びだな…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's just a kid playing around...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's just a kid playing around...

MESSAGE.JP: 樹がマウンドから降り、コーチボックスにつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki leaves the mound and moves into the coach's box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki leaves the mound and moves into the coach's box.

MESSAGE.JP: は今一度集中する。
MESSAGE.EN: I get myself focused once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I get myself focused once again.

MESSAGE.JP: 手が変わろうが、やることは同じだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter who it is, what I need to do doesn't change.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter who it is, what I need to do doesn't change.

MESSAGE.JP: ットを構え、鈴を睨み据える。
MESSAGE.EN: I raise my bat and stare at Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I raise my bat and stare at Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: が振りかぶる。
MESSAGE.EN: She cocks the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cocks the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: こいっ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Come on.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Come on.

MESSAGE.JP: すっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Gu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Gu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、謙吾に投げたらダメだってば！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I told you, Rin, you can't throw at him!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I told you, Rin, you can't throw at him!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい、手元がくるっただけだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Shut up. I just missed a little!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Shut up. I just missed a little!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ールは俺に当たって、地面を転がる。
MESSAGE.EN: The ball hits me and drops down onto the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ball hits me and drops down onto the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: れを真人が拾い上げ、鈴に返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato picks it up and returns it to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato picks it up and returns it to her.

MESSAGE.JP: しっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Catch*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Catch*.

MESSAGE.JP: はさっきマウンドを降りる時、なんて考えた？
MESSAGE.EN: What was it I thought as I left the mound?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was it I thought as I left the mound?

MESSAGE.JP: ―そもそもこの勝負で、ストライクゾーンに投げる必要なんてないのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――To begin with, there's no need to throw to the strike zone in this particular game.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――To begin with, there's no need to throw to the strike zone in this particular game.

MESSAGE.JP: うか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I just realized...
MESSAGE.Translation: I just realized...

MESSAGE.JP: はノーコン…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's a no-con...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's a no-con...

MESSAGE.JP: まりこの継投は…アリだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: So this substitution of pitchers... is a favorable one.
MESSAGE.Translation: So this substitution of pitchers... is a favorable one.

MESSAGE.JP: れを今ようやく悟った。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally realized that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally realized that.

MESSAGE.JP: 樹は…それに気付いていたのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Riki... was this your intent?
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki... was this your intent?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴、とりあえず謙吾には当てないようにっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whatever you do, Rin, just don't throw at Kengo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whatever you do, Rin, just don't throw at Kengo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気付いてないだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess not.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess not.

MESSAGE.JP: 然か。
MESSAGE.EN: Apparently it was only an accident.
MESSAGE.Translation: Apparently it was only an accident.

MESSAGE.JP: としても、何も変わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: Either way, it changes nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Either way, it changes nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: くら当てられようが、ストライクを待てばいいだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how many times she throws at me, I'll just keep waiting for an easy ball to come.
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how many times she throws at me, I'll just keep waiting for an easy ball to come.

MESSAGE.JP: ィン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Clang*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Clang*!

MESSAGE.JP: ァール…。
MESSAGE.EN: Foul...
MESSAGE.Translation: Foul...

MESSAGE.JP: れで二本目だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I have two fouls...
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I have two fouls...

MESSAGE.JP: い込まれた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've gotten myself cornered...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've gotten myself cornered...

MESSAGE.JP: ういうことだ、これは…。
MESSAGE.EN: What the hell is happening to me...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What the hell is happening to me...?

MESSAGE.JP: うして俺はストライクを待ちきれず、ボール球に手を出してしまっているんだ…？
MESSAGE.EN: Why do I keep hitting bad balls? Why can't I just wait for an easy ball to come...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why do I keep hitting bad balls? Why can't I just wait for an easy ball to come...?

MESSAGE.JP: れはもうかれこれ二時間は対峙しているからだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's because it's been roughly two hours since we started...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's because it's been roughly two hours since we started...

MESSAGE.JP: 覚が麻痺している…。
MESSAGE.EN: Most of my senses have numbed...
MESSAGE.Translation: Most of my senses have numbed...

MESSAGE.JP: 初の一時間ぐらいはバットが届く範囲にすらこなかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: For the first hour, she couldn't even pitch within the range of my bat...
MESSAGE.Translation: For the first hour, she couldn't even pitch within the range of my bat...

MESSAGE.JP: のためか、バットが届けば幸運とばかりに振ってしまっている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Probably because of that, I now can't help but swing the bat when the ball comes within the limits of my reach...
MESSAGE.Translation: Probably because of that, I now can't help but swing the bat when the ball comes within the limits of my reach...

MESSAGE.JP: の中で、ストライクゾーンが異様に広がっているのだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...My strike zone has become bizarrely wider...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...My strike zone has become bizarrely wider...

MESSAGE.JP: んな感覚、初めてだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I've never had this kind of feeling before...
MESSAGE.Translation: I've never had this kind of feeling before...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「タイム！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Time out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Time out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: は手を挙げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I raise both of my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I raise both of my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 人が鈴を止める。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato gives Rin a signal to stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato gives Rin a signal to stop.

MESSAGE.JP: 度ボックスをはずし、胸を叩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I step out of the box and hit myself on the chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I step out of the box and hit myself on the chest.

MESSAGE.JP: 覚よ、目を覚ませ。
MESSAGE.EN: All my senses, wake up.
MESSAGE.Translation: All my senses, wake up.

MESSAGE.JP: 静にボールは見送り続けろ。最初の一時間のように…。
MESSAGE.EN: I have to keep waiting calmly for a good ball to come, just like I did for the first hour...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have to keep waiting calmly for a good ball to come, just like I did for the first hour...

MESSAGE.JP: の鍛え上げられた精神はこんなことで挫けるのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Can't all my ironed-out mental discipline not even get over this?
MESSAGE.Translation: Can't all my ironed-out mental discipline not even get over this?

MESSAGE.JP: うだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, it can.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, it can.

MESSAGE.JP: んな無駄な積み重ねなどしてきていない。
MESSAGE.EN: I haven't been wasting all of my time cultivating such a weak mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I haven't been wasting all of my time cultivating such a weak mind.

MESSAGE.JP: は『勝つため』だけに、鍛錬してきたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I have been training myself just ❛for winning.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I have been training myself just ❛for winning.❜

MESSAGE.JP: れまで生きてきた時間のほとんどを費やして。
MESSAGE.EN: Most of my life I have spent for that purpose alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Most of my life I have spent for that purpose alone.

MESSAGE.JP: たなければ、すべてが無駄になるぞ。
MESSAGE.EN: If I lose here, everything will have been in vain.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I lose here, everything will have been in vain.

MESSAGE.JP: んなことはあってはならないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I can never let that happen.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can never let that happen.

MESSAGE.JP: は後悔など絶対にしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I will never have regrets.
MESSAGE.Translation: I will never have regrets.

MESSAGE.JP: たくない。
MESSAGE.EN: That I don't want.
MESSAGE.Translation: That I don't want.

MESSAGE.JP: を張り、ボックスに入る。
MESSAGE.EN: I hold up my head and reenter the box.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hold up my head and reenter the box.

MESSAGE.JP: ぅと呼吸を長めにとり、整える。
MESSAGE.EN: I take a deep breath and steady my breathing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I take a deep breath and steady my breathing.

MESSAGE.JP: し…
MESSAGE.EN: All right...
MESSAGE.Translation: All right...

MESSAGE.JP: こう。
MESSAGE.EN: Here I go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Here I go.

MESSAGE.JP: えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I raise my bat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I raise my bat.

MESSAGE.JP: 人が再開を告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato announces the resumption.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato announces the resumption.

MESSAGE.JP: た長い戦いの始まりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A long fight has commenced yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: A long fight has commenced yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: 気でこの俺が負けてどうする。
MESSAGE.EN: For me to lose to someone when it comes to patience?
MESSAGE.Translation: For me to lose to someone when it comes to patience?

MESSAGE.JP: ったく笑えない。
MESSAGE.EN: That'd be a lame joke.
MESSAGE.Translation: That'd be a lame joke.

MESSAGE.JP: が再開の一球を投じた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin pitches the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin pitches the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: ットは十分届く。
MESSAGE.EN: I can reach it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I can reach it.

MESSAGE.JP: も高い。
MESSAGE.EN: But it's high.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it's high.

MESSAGE.JP: 送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I let it go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let it go.

MESSAGE.JP: の力を抜いたところで、すとんと落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I release the tension in my body, the ball curves downward.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I release the tension in my body, the ball curves downward.

MESSAGE.JP: 変化球。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A forkball.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A forkball.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ストライク！　バッターアウト！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Strike! Batter's out!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Strike! Batter's out!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 馬鹿な。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Impossible.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Impossible.

MESSAGE.JP: この俺が…
負け…た…
MESSAGE.EN: ...lost...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...lost...

MESSAGE.JP: 俺は常勝で…
MESSAGE.EN: ...I who have always won...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I who have always won...

MESSAGE.JP: いつものように勝利をものにして…
MESSAGE.EN: ...There is nothing special about me winning...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There is nothing special about me winning...

MESSAGE.JP: 手に入れるべきものがあったはずなのに…
MESSAGE.EN: ...But there was something I had to gain...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But there was something I had to gain...

MESSAGE.JP: ここで勝たなければならなかったのに…
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had to win this fight...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had to win this fight...

MESSAGE.JP: これじゃあ、すべてが水の泡じゃないか…
MESSAGE.EN: ...Everything has just come to nothing...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Everything has just come to nothing...

MESSAGE.JP: それは、本当に『すべて』だ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...Literally ❛everything❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Literally ❛everything❜...

MESSAGE.JP: なんだったんだ、俺の人生は…
MESSAGE.EN: ...What have I lived my life for...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What have I lived my life for...?

MESSAGE.JP: 武道に費やした日々は、時間は…
MESSAGE.EN: ...What is the meaning of all those days I sacrificed for kendo...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What is the meaning of all those days I sacrificed for kendo...?

MESSAGE.JP: こんなことになるんなら…
MESSAGE.EN: ...If I'd known I would end up like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If I'd known I would end up like this...

MESSAGE.JP: 捨てていればよかったんだ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...I should've just given it up...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I should've just given it up...

MESSAGE.JP: とっくの昔に…
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had the opportunity to do so...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had the opportunity to do so...

MESSAGE.JP: その機会はあったんだ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...those many years ago...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...those many years ago...

MESSAGE.JP: あいつが…
恭介が作ってくれたんだ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kyousuke gave it to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kyousuke gave it to me...

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと、遊んでいればよかったんだ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...I should've spent all my time just playing...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I should've spent all my time just playing...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介たちと…
MESSAGE.EN: ...with them...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...with them...

MESSAGE.JP: なあ、恭介…
MESSAGE.EN: ...Right, Kyousuke...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Right, Kyousuke...?

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「おまえの親父は、俺たちが倒してやった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝We beat up your dad for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝We beat up your dad for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「もう誰もおまえをとめる奴はいねぇぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝Now there's no one stopping you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝Now there's no one stopping you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「いくだろ、一緒に？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝You wanna come with us, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝You wanna come with us, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、連れていってくれ、恭介。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Yeah, let me go with you guys, Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Yeah, let me go with you guys, Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「あんなしょぼくれたツラして毎日剣ふってても、何も楽しくないもんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝I know you're bored doing nothing but kendo practice every single day. Who'd find that fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝I know you're bored doing nothing but kendo practice every single day. Who'd find that fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まったくだ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...You're so right...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...You're so right...

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「おまえには天賦の才とやらがあるのかもしれないが、そのおかげでこんな暮らし…ったく、同情するぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝You may be talented, but you're forced to live like this just for that... Damn, what a pity.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝You may be talented, but you're forced to live like this just for that... Damn, what a pity.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、こんなものいらなかったんだ…
MESSAGE.EN: ...Yeah, I didn't need such talent...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Yeah, I didn't need such talent...

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「おまえの名は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝Your name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝Your name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 宮沢謙吾…
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kengo Miyazawa...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kengo Miyazawa...

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「俺は恭介だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝I'm Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝I'm Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「よし、謙吾、今日から俺たちは友達だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝All right, Kengo, we are friends from today on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝All right, Kengo, we are friends from today on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少年@「一緒に遊ぶぞ、ついてこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Young Boy@❝Let's go play together. Follow me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Young Boy@❝Let's go play together. Follow me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Okay...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Okay...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾…どうして泣いてるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo... Why are you crying?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo... Why are you crying?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後悔の涙だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝These are tears of regret...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝These are tears of regret...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そう…つらかったんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see... You were having a hard time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see... You were having a hard time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「続きは…できる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can you... keep going?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can you... keep going?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もちろん、するさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Of course, I will...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Of course, I will...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もう勝ち負け関係なくな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I don't care who wins anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I don't care who wins anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…そうだね。そうしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right... I don't care, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right... I don't care, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「遊ぼう、謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Play with us, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Play with us, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「待ってくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝A moment...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝A moment...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「もうちょっとだけ、泣かせてくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Let me cry a little longer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Let me cry a little longer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、いいよ、待ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure. I will wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure. I will wait.❞
